description: Android port of the open source glTRON a 3D lightbike racing game. Relive the film as you try and cut off your opponents before they cut you off!! The original and still the best Android port of GL TRON Now with user options 1) Bike Colour select from 6 colours 2) Toggle Music / SFX on/off 3) Toggle FPS counter 4) Change Camera mode 5) Select number of players between 2 and 6 6) Select Arena Size (Small, Medium, Large) 7) Select Game Speed (Slow, Normal, Fast, Extreme) Note: Increasing the Arena size and adding players reduces performance. Based on version 0.7 of glTRON found at www.gltron.org Code is under GPL and can be found here: https://github.com/Chluverman/android-gltron A wiki is also located there for help comments etc... A copy of the GPL license can be found here: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-1.0.html Please note that if you wish to re-release this code you must adhere to the GPL which means making your code change available to others.

Hear the latest from the most informed and entertaining voices in sports radio: • The Dan Patrick Show • Jay Mohr Sports • J.T. “The Brick” • FOX Sports Daybreak • Plus the complete FOX Sports Radio lineup You also get full access to FOX Sports podcasts: • The Jay & Dan Podcast • MMA Roasted • The Fighter & The Kid • The Buzz with Jimmy Traina • Unconventional Wisdom • And many more FOX Sports provides a bunch of great features you can use to get you FOX Sports fix however and whenever you want: • Listen to radio shows live • Stream radio show hours, full podcasts, and podcast clips on demand • Download content to listen to later • Adjust playback speed, and jump to the next item in your list • Set your Favorites to download new content automatically, even with the app isn’t open • Share clips and shows via text, mail, Twitter, or Facebook FOX Sports Listen is free to download and requires no sign-in. Music Tales is comprehensive and learning game for kids that will introduce them to the basics of music and will help to develop their talent moving from the simplest things to more complex ideas. The game consists of several "stories". Each story explains some music and harmony theory and offers exercises related to it. Currently there are three stories: – Pitch, which introduces the concept of pitch and explains the notes, – Musical Instruments, which tells about the keyboard instruments, the piano keyboard, and shows how to play simple melodies using it, and – Free Play, which allows the kid to use the mobile device as a small keyboard. While explaining how music works and teaching the basics of music in a simple way (works best for 3-6 years old kids), the stories also help to develop color perception, ability to compare different colors (1-3 year old kids), and improve small motility practical skills (2-4 year old kids). The game is actively developed and new stories are coming soon. Key features: – Teaches your kid music basics in a simple and easy way – Allows you to use your phone or tablet as a small piano keyboard - Free play without rounds and tasks – Suitable for all ages Just download and enjoy! Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FlexyMind We will be grateful for all kinds of feedback. Please send your comments and suggestions to info@flexymind.com and together we can make the game even better.

An awesome set of beautiful HD quality animated, cinemagraph style, 3D multi-layered parallax live wallpaper scenes that have been lovingly hand-crafted for you to choose from. *** FREE version features these scenes*** *Spider's Web *Little Miss Painter *Polar Bear *** PRO version features these additional scenes *** *Malevolence *Nightfall *Shark Attack *Squadron *Wizard -New Slideshow option (from 1 minute - 24 hours) to change the scenes automatically -Extremely smooth and responsive gyro (and accelerometer) controlled multi-layered parallax live wallpapers with additional animated effects to make them feel like "Cinemagraphs". -Self-levelling algorithm re-centres scenes dynamically -Adjustable translational/rotational movement options to enhance the 3D effect -Cinema Mode with adjustable speed – for hands-free, cinematic enjoyment of animated scene -Battery/performance optimized with framerate limiter (15 - 60 FPS) -OpenGL ES2.0 hardware graphics optimized *** Instructions for use *** As this is a live wallpaper, it can be installed as follows: Home --> Menu --> Wallpapers --> Live Wallpapers IMPORTANT: PLEASE TRY ONE OF OUR FREE WALLPAPERS TO ENSURE IT IS COMPATIBLE WITH YOUR DEVICE. *** Please note this new release of the wallpaper is a major enhancement to the previous version. Some users my find that some of their favourite scenes may have been removed. Unfortunately, this action has been taken proactively by us to ensure that we stay within the new, stricter, Google Developer Guidelines. However, rest assured, we have endeavoured to release this new version with new features such as cinemagraphs, animations and slideshow that were not available in the old version. We hope you will enjoy them as much as we enjoyed putting them together. *** If you find a bug or the wallpaper does not respond in any way then please email us at info@codefaqtory.com with your phone model name, the Android OS version and the description of the problem, before writing a negative comment. Customer satisfaction is our priority, and we will do our best to fix the issues as soon as possible.

description: One touch HD Camera. Take a pic with just one touch. ★What is QuickShot? When it comes to Cameras on phones there has always been one major drawback when trying to take a spur of the moment, once in a lifetime picture. The drawback being that by the time you had got your phone out your jeans pocket (no easy task in itself) unlocked the screen, loaded the app and pressed the shutter button the moment had passed. However, there is hope with the ultimate phone camera app, QuickShot HD. This app is the perfect way to capture those once in a life time moments. Once the app is installed, you simply add the icon to your homescreen and get ready. Now when the moment arises all you need to do is point your phone in the right direction and click the icon on your homescreen and the picture is saved to your gallery. Take a QuickShot without turning on the camera or leaving the home screen of your phone. ★How does QuickShot Work? The photo that you click will be in the best possible silent photo taking mode of the camera. If you you don't mind the shutter sound, change it from 'QS Settings' in the app drawer. ★How do I use QuickShot? Just touch the icon for QuickShot or QuickShot Auto and wait for the photo to be clicked in High Definition! (Higher the quality, longer it takes to click the photo.) ★★★Features★★★ ★ One touch Camera ★ High Def(available in the settings) ★ One touch Auto shoot mode(press back or home button to stop Auto shoot.) ★ Auto Focus ★ Face-detection Mode ★ Enable/Disable Auto Focus ★ Silent Camera ★ Various resolutions ★ Vibration feedback on photo clicked ★ Front and Back Camera Support. ★ Front and Back Camera separate resolution support. ★ Hide the clicked photos. Reviewed as "THE ULTIMATE CAMERA APP" by AndroidPIT Amazing reviews from the likes of PhoneArena, makeuseof.com, Droid-Life, AndroidPit, Androcid and many more! Capture the Most Beautiful Moment - Editor Picked by AppEggs.com Featured in top paid apps from the day of release and is still the number 1 app for top new paid apps in Photography category! Initial release. If you find any issues, please contact us. We'll fix it or refund you! Don't down- rate the app please. Contact us with issues. Silencing of the camera depends on the location and manufacturer of device. In some cases it is not allowed to silence the camera. Cheers! If you are looking for Camera, Quick Camera, Fast photo, Quick Photo, Quick Camera, Quick Photograph, Quick Cam, Quick Photography, Fast Burst Camera, Burst Shot, Camera Burst mode, Quick Burst Camera, One Click camera, One touch Camera, Camera Widget, Spy Shot Camera, Quick Pic etc. this is the right app for you!
release_text: Thank you for the mails regarding the issues! v2.0.2 . Minor Bug Fixes. . Speed Improvements v2.0.1 . New feature: Face Detection mode added for AutoShot mode! Available from preferences. . New method to calibrate shutter speed that varies from phone to phone. Thus making the app faster. . Bug Fixes. . Supports Android 4.2 now!

description: This is the official Find Phone application for your Sony smart accessory. With this app, you can locate your smartphone if it is within a distance of up to 30 feet/10 meters. By activating Find Phone in your Sony smart accessory, your smartphone will ring. To use this app extension, you must have Smart Connect installed on your smartphone if you are using SmartWatch MN2, SmartWatch SW2 or SmartBand™ SWR10. If you use this app with SmartBand™ Talk SWR30 you will need the SmartBand™ Talk SWR30 dedicated Sony app. Note: When you have installed this app, it will be activated automatically in your smart accessory. It will not appear in your application screen or home screen. Open the application settings via Smart Connect or via the phone or tablet status bar. When using SmartBand™ Talk SWR30 you'll need to open the dedicated Sony app and add the application. Works with: SmartWatch MN2, SmartWatch SW2, Smart Wireless Headset pro MW1, SmartBand™ SWR10, SmartBand™ Talk SWR30. If you want to develop apps or app extensions for innovative Sony accessories, go to www.sonymobile.com/developer. Android apps and app extensions by Sony are designed to work with Android smartphones and tablets. However, some manufacturers may have set compatibility limitations in their devices resulting in decreased functionality. Enjoy!

FREE CALLS on MOST 08 NUMBERS! Fed up with queueing for UK call centres? The WeQ4U App gets you through without waiting on 01/02/03/08 numbers! As featured in Which?, Metro, The Guardian, The Sunday Times, Call Centre Focus, Kiss FM, Heart, BBC Radio and TV and The Gadget Show amongst others. WINNER Real Business Future 50 People's Champion Award! WeQ4U is an Android app that works with any Android phone, and puts you through to ANY UK number starting 01, 02, 03, 05 or 080, as well as thousands of other 084 and 087 numbers in our extensive database of UK companies. To use it, just enter the number you wish to reach and the app will connect you. If you get stuck in a queue, just press 9* on your telephone keypad, and your phone will disconnect from the call. We'll stay in the queue for you, and when an agent answers, you will be automatically reconnected straight away. ***We Queue For You***We Q For You***We Queue 4 You***We Q 4 You***We Queue For U***We Q For U***We Queue 4 U***We Q 4 U*** We save you time and money: Calls through WeQ4U are included in your standard minutes, saving you around 30p per minute on your 084 and 087 calls! Plus, you don't use any minutes for the time we wait in the queue for you. How good is that! If you're on Contract, this makes the calls FREE so long as you don't go over your monthly allowance for 01/02/03 numbers. If you are on Pay As You Go / Top Up, then you only pay your standard 01/02/03 rate for the calls, instead of the much higher rates mobile companies charge when you call 084 or 087 numbers direct. WeQ4U also has an auto-use feature so it will automatically be used on 08 numbers whenever possible, whether you call through the application or through the normal phone dialer, or contacts. You can disable this by starting the app and unchecking the Auto-Use box, if you need to. This version of WeQ4U is ad supported. Search for 'WeQ4U NoAds' to find the ad-free version. If you have questions or feedback please email us at custserv@weq4u.co.uk please. It is difficult for us to help you if you leave a negative review. You may be able to answer your query by visiting www.weq4u.co.uk too. Does it record my calls? No. We just deliver them straight to the call centre. Will it share my personal details? No. We take privacy very seriously, and are not interested in your personal information. What about my Contacts? The WeQ4U App creates a WeQ4U Contact in your phone that may have several numbers that WeQ4U may use. This is so you can tell when a call is going through our service. It does not access your contacts in any other way, or for any other reason. We're on the level! You can see our full privacy policy at http://www.weq4u.co.uk/privacy.html So what's the catch? There isn't one. Enjoy! NOTE: For numbers that do NOT start with 01,02,03,05 or 080, the number must exist in our database in order do be used. We have tens of thousands of 084 and 087 numbers from public sources. Most popular 084 and 087 numbers are in our database. Overall, we are able to successfully service 70% of all queries for these numbers. Please note: Alternate numbers are sourced from publicly available sources. We cannot accept responsibility for the accuracy or quality of any alternative numbers used by the app/service, as we can't manually check every one. Use of WeQ4U is therefore entirely at your own risk. WeQ4U is the latest round in our battle to end the misery of waiting on hold at UK call centres. We need your help to make it work! Please sign up to our Facebook and Twitter apps too - these give you an extra chance to win £1,000 with every call you make.

QuickWatch tells you which episode of a TV show to watch next on your XBMC. It groups/sorts all TV shows in the following categories: - Episodes that you started watching but did not finish yet. - New episodes of TV shows where you already started watching a season (S0xE0y). - First episodes of new seasons of TV shows you have watched before (S0xE01). - First episodes of TV shows you have never started watching (S01E01). QuickWatch it NOT a full-blown XBMC remote, nor a library browser, nor a download manager. It simply uses the data available on your XBMC to suggest what to watch next. Note: The app shows an ad on the main screen. The ad can be disabled through an in-app purchase.

FlyoverGPS is an offline (or online) mapping app that allows caching of OpenStreetMaps, Nokia Satellite or Google Maps Tiles for offline viewing, as in "Airplane Mode" without a Network connection. It displays a flyover map of your plane's location when in flight if your device hardware is capable of getting a GPS fix while in the air. It is optimized for airline passenger use when flying, also displaying -speed -altitude -heading in english or metric units, or can be configured to display heading in compass degrees or speed in knots. This app can also be used to cache maps for offline use in any travel situation, or is perfectly capable of displaying your position and direction with a network connection. GPSTest included, as GPS fixes in an airplane without benefit of network triangulation can be problematic. The best results that have been reported involve a southern exposure window seat, although newer phones seem to be much better at achieving a GPS fix than older ones. I would be interested in comments documenting this behavior. Finally, be aware that while most airlines do expressly allow GPS receivers to be used during the cruise portion of the flight, some do not. The in-flight use of electronic devices is always subject to the final decision of the Captain and Flight crew.

Camera measure: Partometer is a good, easy to use and handy app for object length, width, size, angles, area and dimensions measurements . It can be used as a ruler, tape measure or planimeter. A must have tool for accurate measurements on pictures or photos or using camera of your device. Modes: Length-Mode - measure and divide an object in certain ratio or mark length on the object using ratio ruler (slider). FreeHand-Mode - measure an object in any direction and compare sizes to each other. Angle-Mode - measure length, area and angle on an object in any direction and compare sizes to each other. Area-Mode - area calculator, measure area of different shapes Circle-Mode - measurements on circular objects: radius, arc, length, sector, area, angle. Partometer can be handful if: - moving in and need to measure size of your room quickly - buying furniture and want to estimate its size - measure baggage size - when buying glasses and need to measure Pupillary Distance (PD) - measure fabric or cloth area and size - measure trees - need to measure out some distances on objects (handcraft, woodcraft, etc.) - outdoor and want to know size of a big object that practically impossible to measure with a ruler or tape measure. For example, you can measure height of a house using sheet of paper as a reference object. - measure small objects just by placing them on A4 or Letter sheet - measure or compare height of a person - compare objects to each other - measure angles, pitch gauge - measure spark plug gap - measure rectangle areas - measure bearings, roller bearings, nuts, rings. - measure any internal feature or free, irregular shape area on X-ray if you have a reference, useful for dentists - metric and imperial units: meters, centimeters, millimeters, inches, feet Features: flashlight, autofocus, Save and Share results. Depending on the distance to object with this camera measure app you can achieve sub mm resolution

description: Levels and dimensions are fascinating, aren't they? That is why we prepared a new, challenging and addictive puzzle game "Blocks: Levels". Now our blocks vary in size, shape and color. When You combine shape and size of the tiles, You may deduce its level. We won't give You the exact recipe for the Level puzzle. Well OK, a little hint: there are three levels of the blocks. "Blocks: Levels" provides a brilliant fun for children and adults. Basic principle of this puzzle game is simple: You have to remove blocks of the same color, shape and size from the board. There are some restrictions however: You may remove only group of tiles of the same color, shape and size that are connected to each other vertically or horizontally. Group of tiles has to consist of at least three blocks of the same kind. Some other things You have to know before You play this awesome game: One tile of the next level appears in place of the removed blocks. After removing the tiles of the highest level there is a bonus - a handful of gold coins, which gives You 500 bonus points! "Blocks: Levels" is the the most difficult puzzle game made by us by now. How many points will You gain? Can You solve the mystery of Levels? Download "Blocks: Levels" for free and have fun!

description: Bubble Wars (Orb Wars 2.0) is two bubble shooter games in one. In the Attack mode, shoot colored bubbles at the bubble spinner circle and try to shrink it. If you get 3 or more colors in a row the bubbles burst and are destroyed. Otherwise the circle can grow. Once it is large enough to hit you the game ends. In the Defend modes, shoot colored bubbles at a bubble spinner ring of bubbles that surrounds you. If you get 3 or more colors in a row the bubbles burst are destroyed. Otherwise the ring can start shrinking around you. Once it reaches you the game ends. How to play: Simply shoot bubbles, trying to get 3 or more bubbles of the same color next to each other. Try to finish a level to go to the next, where you get more points for each destroyed bubble. At the beginning, try to reduce the number of bubbles by destroying three or more at a time. When their number has decreased, aim to remove bubbles of the same color. Once all bubbles of a certain color are gone, the color won't come back, make it easier to remove bubbles of the remaining colors. Each bubble is worth 1 point times the level you're playing so the higher the level, the more points you earn. However the higher the level, the more bubbles that can fall and the number of colors also increases. Each game (Attack & Defend) maintains its own high score so you can know how well you did. Advanced tips: You can not really throw away bubbles you do not need. If a bubble leaves the screen, it will come back the next time bubbles are added. Because of this, make sure you do not throw away bubbles unless you really have to. Or unless you are sure you can finish the level before the bubbles come back. Bubbles with a warning triangle or those jiggling are in an unknown state. It they are attached to, or become attached to the game area, they will push inward and are bad for you. If they are not attached, they help you by acting as a shield and keeping other bubbles from reaching the game area. Thanks for playing Bubble Wars / Orb Wars 2.0! This application includes fonts created by Dan Zadorozny. This application includes sound effects created by DJ Griffin and Iwan Gabovitch.

description: From the makers of android's most popular meditation app (OM Meditation) comes a fun way to alleviate stress! Now features over 300+ time tested stress relief tips. . Research shows that some stress is good as it helps in increasing our performance. However, if stress is allowed to affect us over a longer term, our performance and health will ultimately decline. . Stress causes the brain and nervous systems to over-work. The best way to get stress relief is to do monotonous or repetitive tasks that do not require much conscious mental inputs. Another proven way for Stress Management is to get engaged in some creative activity that causes positive energy to flow. . For a long time, Bubble Wraps have helped reduce stress by allowing repeated bursting of air bubbles. But bubble wraps get over and may not be readily available when you want to de-stress. Here is an endless bubble wrap that you can keep bursting whenever and however long you want! It also gives you some interesting statistics of your expertise in bursting bubbles! . This Stress Buster app also provides a second way to reduce stress. Create your own drawings and share with friends, just by blowing and bursting bubbles! To add to the fun aspect, it allows you to change the popping sounds, color and shape of the bubbles. . The stress tips would help you cope with depression and alleviate stress from your daily life. . The app is lightweight and does not require any special permissions other than to save drawings to local storage. . Wishing you good health and lot of fun...

description: Welcome to Joy Thug Radio. Flowing from your computer sound systems. From your Internet-connected car stereos. From your head phones and ear phones plugged into your smart phones. Racing to your temporal lobes at 770 miles per hour. At 1,130 feet per second. Originating from just west of Brick City, N.J., in the shadows of New York City. On the Joy Thug Radio menu, an electronic-alternative carte du jour with old new wave, new new wave, chill wave, dance, dancehall, dub, dubstep, industrial, ambient, trance, trip hop, hip hop and other stuff. Joy Thug Radio is a derivative of Joy Thug Art & Design, where you’ll find artwork, website graphics and t-shirt designs designed by me, Billy Swayze. The store is always open at www.joythug.com. Who am I? And why Joy Thug? What’s in the name? That’s spelled out by clicking the aforementioned link. I’ve always been a music junkie. Was a deejay on a small, extremely fun radio station in northwestern New Jersey and at an industrial club in New York City in the 90s. And now, thanks to technology, a little bit of money and the good people at Wohooo Networks, I’m the gran jefe loco and único trabajador of Joy Thug Radio. The music-streaming masses will be reached on a number of platforms on the web as well as on your smart phone, with Joy Thug Radio offering an Android and iPhone app to connect to us. Listeners will also have a way to find us on iTunes and soon almost universally in all cars to meet the growing demand for car Internet radio. Thank you for visiting and letting Joy Thug Radio into your brain!

Key features: - Displays current weather and weather forecast for 5 days, - Automatic positioning, - Selection of units, - Two sources of weather data, - Two icon sets, - Four SmartWatch 2 widget, - Support SmartWatch (MN2), SmartWatch 2 (SW2), SmartBand™ Talk SWR30 and Smart Wireless Headset pro (MW1). If your phone is turned off access to determining the location, then go to the plugin settings and select your city (and country, if necessary). Change any other settings as desired. How to use: Left/Right swipe - next/previous day. Long press on screen - update forecast. Easy top-up is a mobile application that uses the phone`s camera to top up pre-paid airtime scratch cards. one scratches the card then takes a snapshot of the pin digits on the card. the app then uses and inbuilt OCR to detect the pin and then launches the USSD service for top-up. A module for keeping of top-up records so that one can have a detailed insight on his/her airtime usage integrate the app with all phone operating systems make the process of toping up airtime as fun as possible add a feature that would allow one to top-up another person`s number using his/her phone.

Cubimania is a 3D match three puzzle game. Rotate a stack of cubes, pick where you want the falling cubes to land, land three or more cubes in a row, and watch as the cubes disappear. Set up combos to make even more cubes disappear!

Play your videos (mp4 and flv files) from your SD-card with this simple player. This player supports only mp4 and flv video formats. Subtitles are not supported yet. You don't need to install Flash® Player Plugin, any other codec or any other plugin to use this app to play videos (flv and mp4 video formats). [Minimum Requirements] Need Android 2.2 or superior. ARMv7 processor with vector FPU, minimum 550MHz, OpenGL ES 2.0, H.264 and AAC HW decoders and 256MB of RAM. [Known Issues] - Some Asus Transformer devices may play videos without audio. - Devices with low processor power may experience poor video quality (delays). [Usage Instructions] 1) Put your favorite mp4 and flv video files on your SD Card. 2) Open MP4 Video Player. 3) Navigate to the video file you want to select. 4) Select the video file to watch.

Weight Tracker from Patient.info allows you to easily track your weight on a daily basis. Use this app to keep track and analyse your progress if you are trying to lose or gain weight. The Weight Tracker lets you set a goal weight and the app will help you track progress towards that goal. Record a photo of your progress as you go along with the photo diary. The app will also provide a detailed weight chart and a measure of your current BMI (body mass index). If you have compatible bluetooth scales, you can pair the scales and transmit your weight to the app via bluetooth without having to manually enter the data. This is optional and you can still use the full features of the app without having bluetooth scales. Plus, get lots of useful information from Patient.info on weight reduction, healthy eating, and physical activity. The app features: - Set weight goals and track progress - Track your weight - Pair Microlife bluetooth scales and auto-add weight entries (optional) - BMI measurement - See weekly weight change and total weight change - Photo journal - Secure password for the app - Choose lbs. or kg. - Graphs show total weight, BMI, and goal weight - Set reminders to input your weight to track your progress - Share your progress to Facebook - Health information leaflets from Patient.info on weight and healthy living (requires internet connection) - Search Patient.info from within the app for more trusted health information (requires internet connection)
release_text: Updated app to allow pairing with Microlife bluetooth scales.

description: ***PrinTap will no longer be supported by Samsung and will be removed from Google Play starting September 10th 2015. Please contact our Customer Service team at printap@sisa.samsung.com , If you have any questions.*** Print photos from your mobile. We've added Walmart to our family of retailers - Walgreens, Sam's Club, CVS & Costco Thanks to your feedback, We have made significant enhancements to the app and are out of Beta now! We would still love to have your feedback to make it even better. Please write to us @ printap@sisa.samsung.com Features: * Stores near you - Shows the nearest stores (within 50 miles) based on your current location or the location entered using the search bar * Preview & Crop - Preview your prints exactly as they would be printed. You can also crop them if you wish * Save your Favorites - Save your favorite stores for future orders * Quick Ordering - Uploads photos in the background so that you can move on to doing other things without waiting for the upload to complete * Zero Set up - No sign up or credit card information required * Quality Prints - Detects low resolution and panorama photos to avoid pixelation and severe cropping * Best coverage in the US - Currently supporting over 20,000 stores across the US (Walgreens, CVS, Costco, Walmart & Sam's Club) with more stores to be added soon * Order from the gallery - Order prints directly from the photo gallery using the Share Via icon

description: **IMPORTANT!!!! If an issue is not reported to us, we cannot resolve the issue! If you're experiencing a crash or having issues figuring out a feature EMAIL US at support@molovi.com ! We WILL address any and all issues, but we can't do so without you telling us that you're having problems. PLEASE HELP US! And we WILL HELP YOU!** **IMPORTANT!!!! DO NOT DELETE ALL CATEGORIES! Doing so will wreak havoc with the app at the present time. You MUST have at least one category of each type (Credit and Debit).** **Featured on Phandroid.com!** **Featured as one of best "10 Apps for Getting Your Personal Finances in Order" on verizoninsider.com** Manage your finances quickly and easily without needing a paper ledger. Balance all of your bank accounts at the touch of a finger on your Android powered phone or tablet! Checkbook Pro offers one convenient place for all your accounts, snapshots of balances, and outstanding payments. Get rid of your paper ledgers and add all of your checking, savings, credit, investment and misc accounts in Checkbook Pro. Enter account transfers, withdraws, payments, credits, debits, fees and more with ease! Save yourself countless hours of tedious balancing with Molovi Software's Checkbook Pro! Backup and Restore your data in the Cloud with ease! Checkbook Pro is the ONLY financial application available for Android that actually LOOKS just like your paper register! The familiar format, combined with a rich set of powerful features will make you wonder how you ever lived without Checkbook Pro and how you ever survived with paper ledgers! Checkbook Pro is an app you can use in place of a paper checkbook, and makes it incredibly simple to manage your finances. One thing most people never leave home without is their smartphone. Now you'll have all of your financial information in your pocket! Enter your purchases the moment you make them and never again have to deal with the headaches of chasing down unknown charges. Avoid costly bank overdraft fees by putting the power in your hands! Even the online bank statements lag when posting transactions--sometimes causing you to believe you have more money than you do which leads to bounced checks and overdraft fees. Put an end to it today, and keep that money in your pocket with Checkbook Pro! Checkbook Pro provides a very powerful set of filterable reports, allowing you to see exactly where your money is going in order to fine-tune your budgets. If you're looking for a Pocket Quicken alternative, this is the app for you! Key Features: • Ledger looks just like the paper register that you're used to. • Customizable Categories • Color-Coded Accounts and Transaction Categories • Unlimited Accounts • View detailed bill & account statements • Powerful Reporting Engine • Cloud Backup/Restore • Automatic Backup Scheduling • CSV/Excel Export • Password Lock • Enjoy financial freedom and peace of mind. • Selectable currencies • Reminders **TOP NOTCH CUSTOMER SERVICE** We believe that a product is only as good as the service behind it. We strive to provide not only the best personal finance app on the Android Market, but also the best customer service. If you have ANY issues, questions, concerns, suggestions or feedback PLEASE do not hesitate to email us at android@molovi.com . You don't need to rate us low/give negative feedback to get our attention. We respond to ALL emails extremely quickly and will do whatever we can to help you. Leaving a 1-star rating does nothing and helps no one. Emailing us allows us to figure out what the issue is and respond to you. Which we will ALWAYS do!

Application for numismatists collecting US or Euro coins. Contains the complete list of commemorative and regular US and Euro coins with their prices. Allows to specify the number of coins you have in your collection and the grading of coins. Allows to view your collection in table mode and export it to Excel! You can leave notes and comments to coins. Has the ability to make backup copy of your collection, which can be transferred to another device. The application contains prices of coins. Rare coins have yellow background, rarity coins have red background. Now your collection is always at hand! Commemorative USA: - 50 State Quarters - Presidential Dollars - America the Beautiful Quarters - Native American - Bicentenary of Lewis and Clark Expedition (2004-2005) - 200th Anniversary - Birth of Abraham Lincoln (2009) - 200th Anniversary - Independence of USA (1976) Circulation USA: Half Cents +Braided Hair (1840-1857) Cents +Flying (1856-1858) +Indian (1859-1864) +Lincoln (1909-) Two & Three Cents +Two Cent Pieces (1864-1873) +Three Nickel (1865-1889) Nickels +Shield (1866-1883) +Liberty (1883-1913) +Buffalo (1913-1938) +Jefferson (1938-) Half Dimes +Seated Liberty (1837-1873) Dimes +Barber (1892-1916) +Mercury (1916-1945) +Roosevelt (1946-) Quarters +Barber (1892-1916) +Standing Liberty (1916-1930) +Washington (1932-1998) Half Dollars +Barber (1892-1915) +Walking Liberty (1916-1947) +Franklin (1948-1963) +Kennedy (1964-) Dollars +Trade (1873-1885) +Morgan (1878-1921) +Peace (1921-1935) +Eisenhower (1971-1978) +Susan B Anthony (1979-1981 + 1999) +Sacagawea (2000-)

Creating a time-lapse movie can be quite hit and miss unless you set your camera up in best way and time your lapses according to your subject. Time-lapse Toolkit will help you to create a time-lapse movie you'll want to show to everyone. What's included? Calculator: The main and best feature of this app is the calculator. Need to know how many frames you need for a certain time-lapse length or even how long you'll be waiting until or your frames have been captured? The calculator, if nothing else, will prove to be the most useful tool in the kit! Equipment List: With this list of equipment, software and bits & pieces, you'll be able to make sure you have everything you need in order to capture and create your time-lapse movie. Interval Timings: Figuring out the interval timings is one of the most crucial parts of creating your time-lapse. Choosing the best interval time depends on the subject you're capturing. This list of interval timings will help you. Camera Settings: Set your camera up in the best way from the get go, so you don't waste valuable time and memory card space firing off thousands of frames, before realising the setup isn't quite how you want it to be. Useful Tips: A few useful tips and tricks – the things that are often forgotten or not though about until it's too late.

"Impariamo la Matematica" è uno strumento utile per chi vuole applicare il metodo per l'apprendimento precoce della matematica, ideato da Glenn Doman, ma anche per chi vuole semplicemente condividere momenti di apprendimento con i propri bambini. Si tratta di una serie di "cartoncini" (anche detti flashcards) in formato virtuale che sarà possibile mostrare al bambino, seguendo i passi stabiliti dal metodo stesso. E' anche possibile registrare ed ascoltare l'audio dei numeri e delle equazioni usando la propria voce. Per una completa e ufficiale descrizione e applicazione del metodo fare riferimento al libro: "La matematica prima dei 3 anni" di Glenn Doman. Imparare la Matematica sarà semplice e divertente. Un'attività da fare insieme a vostro figlio che lo aiuterà a crescere e scoprire cose nuove. Insegnare la matematica è il modo migliore per avviare il bimbo verso un'istruzione più profonda e veloce. Normalmente la matematica viene insegnata partendo dai numeri, dalle sequenze (1, 2, 3..), utilizzando le dita, passando infine a lunghi e difficili processi e insegnando ai bambini a contare a mente. Glenn Doman è convinto che non ci sia alcun bisogno di questo lungo e difficile processo. In base alle sue ricerche, i bambini nascono con l'abilità di distinguere la quantità degli oggetti solo guardandoli. Tutti i bambini hanno questa dote e perderanno questa fantastica abilità se non li aiutiamo a svilupparla. Per farlo, Glenn Doman suggerisce di usare cartelli con pallini rossi, incrementandone il numero gradualmente per abituare i bambini a visualizzare prima le quantità, poi le equazioni con le quantità e persino equazioni molto sofisticate e diseguaglianze. La migliore app disponibile per insegnare la matematica ai bambini. Impariamo la Matematica offre le seguenti funzionalità: Flashcards a schermo intero con rappresentazione di sequenze di numeri a pallini o in formato numerale e con la possibilità di mescolare la sequenza. Flashcards a schermo intero con rappresentazione dei seguenti tipi di equazioni sia in formato a pallini che numerale: - Somme - Sottrazioni - Moltiplicazioni - Divisioni - Tabelline e Insiemi - Diseguaglianze - Percentuali - Combinazioni diequazioni - Algebra Un calendario di 9 settimane basato sul metodo di insegnamento Doman. Sono presenti 3 sessioni giornaliere, per ogni sessione puoi impostare 3 serie di numeri e 3 equazioni. Può essere personalizzato a seconda delle necessità. Registrazione della pronuncia del numero o del simbolo con la tua voce. Ogni volta che il numero o il simbolo viene mostrato il sistema lo riprodurrà. Mostra Subito: un modo rapido di mostrare al bambino un numero o una equazione a propria scelta. Sicurezza Bambino: Previene ogni modifica involontaria alle schermate (modifica delle equazioni o delle serie di numeri, registrazione della voce) Potete supportarci, acquistando la versione senza pubblicità. Grazie a tutti per le recensioni e per il supporto! Blion Games "Learning Mathematics" is a useful tool for those who want to apply the method for the early learning of mathematics, invented by Glenn Doman, but also for those who simply want to share moments of learning with their children. It is a series of "cards" (also called flashcards) in a virtual format that will be possible to show the child, following the steps set by the same method. It 'also possible to record and listen to the sound of numbers and equations using your own voice. For a full and official description and application of the method refer to the book: "The mathematics before the age of 3" by Glenn Doman. Learning Mathematics is fun and easy. An activity to do with your child that will help him grow and discover new things. Teaching math is the best way to start the child to education deeper and faster. Normally, the mathematics is taught starting from the numbers, the sequences (1, 2, 3 ..), using your fingers, finally passing to long and difficult process, and teaching children to count in mind. Glenn Doman is convinced that there is no need for this long and difficult process. According to his research, children are born with the ability to distinguish the amount of objects just by looking. All children have this gift and if you do not lose this amazing ability to help them develop it. To do this, Glenn Doman suggests using signs with red dots, increasing the number gradually to accustom the children to see the first amount, then the equations with the quantity and even very sophisticated equations and inequalities. The best app available to teach math to children. We learn mathematics provides the following features: Flashcards in full screen with a representation of sequences of numbers or dots format numeral and with the possibility of mixing the sequence. Flashcards full-screen representation of the following types of equations is formed into pellets that numeral: - Somme - Subtraction - Multiplication - Divisions - Times Tables and Sets - Inequalities - Percentages - Combinations diequazioni - Algebra A 9-week calendar based on the Doman method of teaching. There are 3 daily sessions, each session can set 3 sets of 3 numbers and equations. Can be customized according to the needs. Record the pronunciation of the number or symbol with your voice. Whenever the number or symbol is displayed the system will play it. See It Now: A quick way to show the child a number or an equation of your choice. Child Safety: It prevents any unintentional change screens (modification of the equations or series of numbers, voice recording) You can support us by purchasing the ad-free version. Thank you all for the reviews and for the support! Blion Games

Are you concerned about your kid's mobile Internet usage? And are you having difficulties on controlling it? Not only for the parents and kids, this app can also help anyone who wants to have schedule-based Wi-Fi control, the Wi-Fi on your device will be automatically turned-on/off based on the policy and schedule. There are 4 versions of Wi-Fi Locker for Kids which can be selected by your use case. You can start with Pro or Free version, and expand features with Remote and Monitor apps. - Wi-Fi Locker for Kids Pro : With running this application on your kid's device, you can easily control your kid's Wi-Fi access based on the basic policy(turn-on or off) and exception schedule. : Not like other monitoring apps, this app does not consume the battery much. : This app uses network time, which means changing local time of the device won't affect to the controlling of Wi-Fi based on the schedule. : Instant Wi-Fi access : With using Remote app on parent's device, parents can give an instant Wi-Fi access remotely via text message. : Monitoring uninstallation : With installing Monitor app on the kid's device, parents can get a notification text message when the Pro or Free(and even Monitor) app is uninstalled. - Wi-Fi Locker for Kids Remote : Remote app helps you to allow instant Wi-Fi access without having admin logon and making changes on the Wi-Fi schedule on your kid's device. It is designed for the situation when you or your kid is outside but your kid needs to have instant Wi-Fi access which is currently not allowed by Wi-Fi Locker for Kids basic policy and exception schedule. : Remote application needs to be installed on parent's device. : With the Remote app, you can generate an "Authentication Code" and send it to your kid directly via text message. Then an instant Wi-Fi access schedule will be automatically registered on your kid's Wi-Fi Locker for Kids application. - Wi-Fi Locker for Kids Monitor : Once the Monitor app is installed on your kid's device, it will automatically send a text message when the Wi-Fi Locker for Kids Pro or Free application is uninstalled. : The Pro or Free app will also send a text message when this Monitor app is uninstalled. : For Android 2.2~3.0 device, the launch icon will disappear right after the installation. : For Android 3.1~ device, please launch it and just quit, then the launch icon will disappear. : You can always uninstall it from Settings->Application manager. - Wi-Fi Locker for Kids Free : Equivalent features with Pro version but has a limit on making multiple Wi-Fi control schedules.

description: LanSchool v7.7 classroom management software is an award winning software program designed to help teachers teach more effectively in a computer-based classroom. (Please note that this application will only function in a LanSchool managed classroom environment.) The LanSchool Student operates within the LanSchool environment providing many of the same features as the desktop LanSchool Student for Mac, Windows and Linux. The Student for Android will have the following benefits for students, teachers, professors or corporate trainers. Assess Student Understanding Students can be quickly polled during a lecture with true/false or multiple choice questions. The student can respond using the LanSchool Student. Help Individual Students Students can silently send questions or request help from the LanSchool Student. A small question mark appears on the teacher's console when a Student sends a question. LanSchool Student for Android features: Discover LanSchool Teacher Consoles The LanSchool logo on the Student display turns from gray to bright green when the Student detects and joins a LanSchool classroom. This is automated although the network channel can be set manually. Student Thumbnails Appear on Teacher Console The icon for the current active application will appear on the LanSchool Teacher Console. Voting The Student can receive and reply to True/False, Multiple Choice or Verbal questions sent by the LanSchool Teacher. Send and Receive Messages The Student can interact with the Teacher Console by sending and receiving questions or messages. Testing The LanSchool Teacher can send a test to the Android student and collect the test results. Test questions can include True / False, Multiple Choice, short answer and essay questions. Images can also be attached to each test question. The LanSchool Student is a free app, but requires LanSchool Lite v7.7 or LanSchool v7.7 to run in a classroom. LanSchool Lite v7.7 is free to K-20 educators and is available from http://www.lanschool.com . It allows teachers to monitor a thumbnail of student computers.
release_text: New this release: * Fixes for localization in testing and voting. * Improved support the the connection server. * Class lists feature implemented (dynamic class lists not supported). * Improved performance of “Show Teacher” with Android student. * Addressed various non-responsive error messages.

description: Lead King Thorund the Wurmhewer and his clan of Dwarves against the surging Goblin uprising! Learn Chess the fun and easy way through unique challenges in single player campaign as your Dwarves face Warg Riders, Goblin Raiders, Cannon Trolls, bombs, mortars, and traps! Then challenge yourself in Online Player vs Player (PvP) as either the Dwarven or Goblin army! The first game of its kind, Dwarven Chess uses the addictive core of Chess combined with 3D fantasy pieces, boards, backgrounds and alternate moves to unleash new strategies in this ancient game! Great for players ages 9-90, levels based on Minesweeper, Sobokan, naval battles, and outpost sieges introduce new players to the fun challenge of Chess, but varying difficulty levels will challenge the masters! =FEATURES= - FREE TO PLAY! - Dwarven Campaign: 8 unique challenges with 24 levels! - Goblin Campaign: 7 unique challenges with 23 levels!* - 30 unique 3D Characters - 15 unique 3D Backgrounds - Table-top mode in Standard and Dwarven rules Chess - Play vs the computer AI in Standard or "Dwarven Rules" Chess - Play online player vs player in Standard or "Dwarven Rules" Chess!!! - If you like The Hobbit, Game of Thrones, and Lord of the Rings, you'll love Dwarven Chess!!!! - Possibly the most in- depth Chess Variant the app world has ever seen!!!! - *Goblin Campaign is an in-app purchase From some people who like us: "VERY COOL! I have only played the first few levels, but as a player of rpgs and chess, this is really unique and fun. Great job devs!" "Unbelievable Really, I love it. Congratulations for your idea, very well idea :)" "Excellent I like it, it is unique not the usual chess games" "It has LOADS of pieces so I will DEFINITELY put down 5 stars!" "Great game! None to complain about!" "Awesome Loved the game only thing that could make it better is more armies but all up probably best chess game I've ever played" Dwarven Chess is not just a puzzle game, strategy game, or Chess game- it's all 3 in one! Play your own unique strategy in multiplayer online battles against other chess opponents, or simply switch to Classic Mode and play a standard 3D Chess game. Participate in the storyline war as the Dwarves are suddenly attacked by goblin uprisings, or reverse the tables and play as the goblin army and wage war on the Dwarves! (Goblin Campaign is an in-app purchase). Some levels require strategic tactics to defend the Dwarves, while others are puzzles based on Sobokan and Mine Sweeper. For Chess enthusiasts, see what it is like to not follow classic openings and moves, but to meet new challenges in this "Chess Variant" with environmental obstacles and situational advantages for your AI opponent. Face bomb-throwing Goblins as you help the Dwarven King escape, and set traps in the Dwarven Bear Camp as you defend it from a goblin patrol! Free to play, "Dwarven Chess Free" is filled with HD quality art, forming over 30 unique pieces all with unique moves from standard Chess. While the download is quite large, "Dwarven Chess Lite" has lower quality graphics, but all the same gameplay with less than half the memory used. 15 different 3D backgrounds and boards make each new challenge something to see, with 3 to 5 levels for each challenge. Face the Ice Ogres and Trolls with your Dwarven Scout Pawns and Bear Rider Knights- all in just one of these glorious challenges! Dwarven Chess is not just for Chess players, but for all fans of fantasy, strategy games, Role-playing games (RPGs), Trading card games (TCGs), puzzle games, board games, and even action and adventure game fans will find fun in all that Dwarven Chess has to offer :)

Record your voice and change it in funny ways. Sound like a robot, chipmunk, alien, and even a didgeridoo. Save your recordings and share them with your family and friends. *** This is the new and enhanced version of the widely popular Funny Voice Changer *** Each effect's speed can be modified. Ever heard a robot-chipmunk? Or a super fat alien? Combine each manipulation with a variety of speeds for hours of fun. While most voice changers simply increase or decrease the speed of your voice, funny voice changer actually replaces the tone of the voice. Voice manipulations include: - Robot - Sonic - Barbershop Quartet - Digeridoo - Goat - Train - Organ - Fan - Car Horn - Gatling Gun - Alien - Banshee For questions, comments, or suggestions please feel free to e-mail me at givewaygames@gmail.com . description: Sticky Notes Widget-Free ==================== The user can make notes quickly using this lite HOME SCREEN WIDGETS.that is, these widgets acts as a typical sticky notes in the home screen. Sticky Notes Widget is an easy to use widget for noting down - daily list of Home Works, - daily things 'to do', - daily items to purchase/procure, - track Money Loans to friends etc - listing down day's plan The user may simply touch the text field of 'Sticky Notes Widget' in the home screen widget to start typing. For Android ICS and JellyBean 1.Install the application 2.go to applications->go to widgets 3.Drag ''Quick Sticky Notes Widget'' to home screen.(press and hold)

De Regenmeterapp is ontwikkeld om snel inzicht te krijgen in neerslaghoeveelheden van uw locatie. De app biedt u volgende features: • Actueel: Neerslag van <3h, <6h, <12h, <24h. • Periode: Neerslag overzicht per week en per maand. • Pushbericht met dagelijkse neerslag • Neerslag overschot/tekort overzicht van Nederland De actuele neerslag zijn de gegevens van de buienradar data per 3 uur. De periode gegevens worden gecorrigeerd met behulp van de op dat moment beschikbare waarnemingen van de neerslaghoeveelheid van stations in het klimatologisch KNMI neerslagmeetnet. De app wordt beschikbaar gesteld door Bayer CropScience Nederland en is ontwikkeld door AppsforAgri.com. Rain With Rapp is designed to quickly understand rainfall amounts of your location. The app offers the following features: • Current: Precipitation of <3h, <6h <12h <24h. • Period: Precipitation overview per week and per month. • Push message with daily rainfall • Precipitation surplus / deficit overview of Netherlands The actual precipitation data from the rainfall radar data every 3 hours. The period data is corrected using the currently available observations of precipitation stations in the climatically KNMI precipitation monitoring network. The app is made available by Bayer CropScience Netherlands and developed by AppsforAgri.com.
release_text: De regenmeter app is uitgebreid met pushnotificatie zodat u automatisch op de hoogte wordt gehouden van de neerslag op uw locatie. Nieuw is ook het neerslag overschot/tekort overzicht van Nederland. Het doorlopend potentieel neerslagoverschot wordt verkregen door het verschil te berekenen tussen de hoeveelheid gevallen neerslag en de berekende referentiegewasverdamping.

description: This app is used to control a WiFi connected GoPro camera. When camera control is started, the app constantly monitors the device's current location. When the device is within a certain radius of one or more preset triggers, the app sends a command to GoPro camera to either start or stop recording a video. It was primarily developed for use on a motorcycle, where it is inconvenient to have to stop and fiddle with the camera, especially if it's not mounted within easy reach. But it can also be used in any situation in which you set the start/stop points in advance and then let the app handle recording control for you, for example on a ski slope, while bicycling,... You can set triggers to start, restart, stop and toggle recording. Triggers can also be set to activate only when you pass the point in a certain direction. Context-sensitive help is available on every screen of the application. The app only requests permissions that are absolutely necessary for the correct functioning of the app. The app does not collect any personal information, does not collect any usage statistics and does not send any information anywhere else. The app does not and never will include any form of advertising. Before downloading this app please make sure that you can connect to your GoPro camera via WiFi and that you can control it remotely with an Android app. You will find detailed instructions on the GoPro web site.
release_text: Google's proximity alerts are unreliable, causing triggers to be randomly missed! Substituted own proximity alerts which work perfectly. WiFi reconnection is much more intelligent (some more optimisation in v1.3.1) Notification area is used when camera cannot be connected Bugfix: Some preferences sometimes didn't get read

What's it worth on eBay? That's what you want to know before selling your stuff on eBay or anywhere else. The eValuator app determines a realistic average price from items successfully sold in the past weeks. Perfect to find out what you can earn selling something, or to check if a promising bargain really is one. The ideal app for any powerseller, sales agent, ambitioned eBayer and for use on flea markets, yard sales and more ... Experience with eBay website (completed listings) is advised to fully take advantage of this app! Features: ===================== * Ad-free version * Supports ebay.at, ebay.ca, ebay.com, ebay.co.uk, ebay.com.au, ebay.ch, ebay.de, ebay.fr, ebay.ie, ebay.it, ebay.nl, ebay.es * Shows estimated price, shipping, price range and net profit at a glance * Statistics show price by day of week and price distribution graph * Search by condition (new, used, ...) and in subcategories * Browse the completed listings found for your search * Adjustable filter: Ignore items containing certain words (eg, defective) Copyright: =================== eBay (R) is a registered trademark of eBay Inc. This app is a private project and is in no way related to eBay Inc., Important: =================== Since April 2010 search in completed items is possible without an eBay account on most country sites. This might change again in the future, in which case the app will inform you. Until then the login only gives you advantages calculating the shipping to your personal location. Of course your account data remains on your device exclusively and is never sent to me, or to other third parties! It is only used to securely login to the eBay website via HTTPS/SSL. Just use the app without login, if you still have concerns! This app is under active development! Suggestions and bug reports are welcome! Reviews of course too ;-) Please note that due to technical reasons this app may be updated quite often! Do not install if this is a problem for you.
release_text: 3.0.8 - Fixed problems with weekday statistics on Android 5 3.0.7 - Filter available in all screens - Updated eBay fee calculation - Fixed a few crashes - Date recognition in ebay.nl optimized 3.0.6 - New feature: filter price-range and date-range (See menu) - Bugfixes and layout improvements 3.0.5 - Fixed "no items found" on certain mobile networks 3.0.4 - Item list performance improved massively - Search input field now deletes text properly

description: FolderSync enables simple sync to cloud based storage to and from local folders on the device SD cards. It support a wide range of different cloud providers and file protocols, and support for more platforms are added continuously. Root file access also supported on rooted devices. Effortlessly sync your files. Backup your music, pictures and other important files from the phone to your cloud storage or the other way around. It has never been easier. Automation support using Tasker and similar programs enables fine grained control of your syncs. FolderSync contains a full file manager, that enables you to manage your files locally and in the cloud. Copy, move and delete your files in your cloud/remote accounts. Support for creation/deletion of buckets in Amazon S3. Upload and download files from the phone. It's all supported. Supported cloud providers - Amazon Cloud Drive - Amazon S3 Simple Storage Service - Box - CloudMe (using WebDAV) - Copy.com - Cubby (using WebDAV) - Digitalbucket.net (using WebDAV) - Dropbox - Dump Truck (using WebDAV) - GoDaddy (using WebDAV) - Google Drive - HiDrive (using WebDAV) - Livedrive Premium (using WebDAV) - MEGA - MyDrive.ch (using WebDAV) - NetDocuments (using WebDAV) - OneDrive - SugarSync - WEB.DE (using WebDAV) - Yandex Disk (using WebDAV) Supported protocols - FTP - FTPS (SSL/TLS implicit) - FTPES (SSL/TLS explicit) - SFTP (SSH File Transfer) - Samba/CIFS/Windows Share - WebDAV (HTTP/HTTPS) Pro/Lite version The lite version contains ads, only allows two accounts and has no sync filters or Tasker support. The pro version has no limitations. In all other regards the pro and lite versions are identical. Twitter http://twitter.com/#!/FolderSync Change log http://www.tacit.dk/foldersync/changelog Support http://www.tacit.dk/support FAQ http://www.tacit.dk/foldersync/faq Translations https://crowdin.com/project/foldersync Permissions ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE Needed to determine current network state ACCESS_WIFI_STATE Needed to access info about the current WiFi state (SSID etc.) CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE/CHANGE_WIFI_STATE These two are needed to be allowed to turn WiFi on and off CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE Needed to autodiscover WebDAV, SMB, FTP and SFTP servers using Bonjour/UPNP protocol INTERNET Needed to access the internet connection to send and retrieve files READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE/WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE Needed to read and write files from and to SD card RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED Needed to automatically start after reboot of device, so scheduled syncs will still run WAKE_LOCK Needed to keep the device running during a sync, so it doesn't enter sleep mode

The application allows you to:   - (New) Gallery  - (New) to hear all Aladaih Moroccan stations directly - Access to the latest news through the site Khbarna.nt  - Browse various news orderly manner through the categories at the top of the application  - Choose your favorite news and return to read them whenever you like cross-favorite "star"  - Write articles, videos and pictures and share them quickly and easily  - Khbarna page on Alvaiciok

description: If you have a good eye and are fast with puzzles than Gem Swap II Premium is sure to be for you! In the game of Gem Swap it is your job to destroy gems by swapping them. The only way gems are able to be destroyed is if they are in rows of three or more gems of the same kind. Time is against you though you must hurry and destroy the gems as quickly as possible in order to advance to the next level! Gems Swap is an exciting game and you will be surprised on how addicting it is! ★ Swap the gems in order so that they will disappear and you will advance to the next level ★ Includes your own personal leaderboard so you can play against your own rank. ★ Built using Adobe AIR. ★ If you have a suggestion or comment let us know! Published by Pulado Games, Inc. in partnership with Fupa.com.

Stories, Legends and Tales of Christmas are quite interesting and have hidden morals to learn from. Most of these stories tell us to love all living things and show kindness to them. Here are 20 selected wonderful stories of Christmas for you to enjoy. 1. Christmas in the Alley - Olive Thorne Miller 2. A Christmas Star - Katherine Pyle 3. The Queerest Christmas - Grace Margaret Gallaher 4. Old Father Christmas - J.H. Ewing 5. A Christmas Carol - Charles Dickens 6. How Christmas Came to the Santa Maria Flats - Elia W. Peattie 7. The Legend of Babouscka - From the Russian Folk Tale 8. Christmas in the Barn - F. Arnstein 9. The Philanthropist's Christmas - James Weber Linn 10. The First Christmas-Tree - Lucy Wheelock 11. The First New England Christmas - G.L. Stone and M.G. Fickett 12. The Cratchits' Christmas Dinner - Charles Dickens 13. Christmas in Seventeen Seventy-Six - Anne Hollingsworth Wharton 14. Christmas Under the Snow - Olive Thorne Miller 15. Mr. Bluff's Experience of Holidays - Oliver Bell Bunce 16. Master Sandy's Snapdragon - Elbridge S. Brooks 17. A Christmas Fairy - John Strange Winter 18. The Greatest of These - Joseph Mills Hanson 19. Little Gretchen and the Wooden Shoe - Elizabeth Harrison 20. Big Rattle - Theodore Goodridge Roberts

Monkey is lost in the temple area and requires your help! Help monkey to climb across the pillars avoiding its enemies like snakes, squirrels, crows and dragonflies. In the advent, picking fruits like banana, watermelon, papaya makes monkey survive against its enemies. Hitting the swinging bells could cost a life for monkey. Weapons help to equip monkey with a protective shield blocking every other enemies which comes in its way.

As melhores frases de perdão, para perdoar e ser perdoado. Frases de Desculpa, absolvição, graça, indulto, remissão. "A abstenção só é perdão quando há o poder para punir." "A mais divina das vitórias é o perdão." "A raiva te torna menor, enquanto o perdão te força a crescer além do que você era." "Não levante a espada sobre a cabeça de quem te pediu perdão. " "O esquecimento é mais sublime que o perdão." "Quem ama perdoa e sabe compreender a imperfeição das outras pessoas." "O Mestre deve ser meio sério,para dar autoridade à lição e meio risonho, para obter o perdão da correção." "Não deixe de perdoar os seus inimigos. Nada os aborrece tanto." The best quotes of forgiveness, to forgive and be forgiven. Phrases of apology, absolution, grace, pardon, remission. "Abstention is forgiveness only when there is the power to punish." "The most divine of victories is forgiveness." "Anger makes you smaller, while forgiveness forces you to grow beyond what you were." "Do not raise the sword over the head of anyone who asked for your forgiveness." "Forgetting is more sublime than forgiveness." "Who loves and forgives know understand the imperfection of others." "The Master should be half serious, to give authority to the lesson and half laughing, for the pardon of correction." "Be sure to forgive his enemies. Nothing annoys them so much."

Ice Floe is a free brain and puzzle game packed with hundreds of levels for hours of fun. You will quickly be addicted ! The goal of the game is to help your penguin get in the ice floe hole. This can be achieved by moving properly the fishermen, bears, whales and walrus found on the board. As you enter the challenge mode, you will be faced with incresinsgly difficult levels. Your children will also be very happy as we included an arcade version with easier to play levels. The game has nice HD graphics. You will also like the various animations such as the one where the penguin moves his feet accross the ice floe.

description: Tennessee Fishing Maps includes links to over 12,500 fishing Lakes, Rivers, and Reservoirs in the State of Tennessee. Each fishing location can be searched by name or by selecting a county and reviewing all lakes, rivers, reservoirs, and even wetlands in the area. Features: -Complete library of over 12,500 fishing locations (lakes, rivers, reservoirs and wetlands). -Fishing locations are searchable by name, or easily retrievable by clicking a county to see all lakes or other features in this geography. -Save a lake or river on your favorites list for easy access to your favorite fishing spots. -Create a journal entry for each fishing experience at a lake, river, stream, reservoir or wetland (swamp). -Can't remember a lake name, the app allows you with ease to review all lakes, rivers, reservoirs or swamps for counties in Tennessee. -Want to share your fishing experiences with your fishing buddies, with one simple click you can email or text (SMS) lake or river details with GPS data to friends. This is a must have app for all fishermen and fisherwomen who love to explore the great waters of Tennessee (TN).

Fishing Champion is a game in top 10 game in iOS App Store. it has 80 kinds of fish,200 levels! have fun! This is a fishing game for free, 200 clearances with different fishes, dual-mode of life and time, in which you can enjoy the fishing as well as enrich your knowledge on fishes at the same time. The background story of the game is the Gulf's annual world fishing contest, in Hawaii, where the fishing enthusiasts around the world gather, in the hope of competing for the Champion title. In addition to the enjoyment of Bay Resort in Hawaii, the fishing champion could also enjoy a trip of Venice. So what are you waiting for? Pick up your fishing gear, and rush to Hawaii to experience the joy of fishing! if you like fishing joy,fishing master,you will like this game. Features: 1. Flexible mode of operation, a better experience of fishing. 2. Different fishes in different clearances, a very good visual experience. 3. A variety of props to increase the difficulty of fishing. if you like fishing joy or fishing master ,you will like this! watch video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CyNhYGxxHbw Follow us on Twitter : http://twitter.com/smart_hand

description: Select one of your SMS conversations or one of your MMS attachments and send it via email. There is free trial version which you can download and use for one day. Please use the trial version first to make sure that the app works on your phone without any problems. use this simple application to backup your text threads, save your MMS attachments or forward your SMS and MMS to any email address, fast and effectively. It can also be used to upload your text SMS messages to Evernote, Dropbox and other services. Also, you can upload your multi-media messages (MMS) to facebook , picasa , twiter and so on. Those long SMS messages that are automatically converted to MMS can now be forwarded to your email account
release_text: fixed issue with SMS threads and contacts with two or more numbers

description: With "Add Ghost to Photo" you will easily and without an effort add scary ghost to your private photo. To create a very reliable photo with ghost you will get advanced graphic effects and possibility to set your ghost position and size anyway you want. Moreover you can share your final ghost picture via most popular social portals, email or another application using "Share" button. All your friends will believe that you have taken a real ghost photo. This application is an excellent tool to fool all your friends on April Fool's Day! Application lets you select picture from your pictures gallery or take a picture using your build-in camera. You will get more than 20 ghost pictures. For each ghost you can set: - transparency level - color - color saturation - brightness - contrast You can also set position, size and rotate the ghost anyway you want to. We have more! This app is also live wallpaper (you can set scary ghosts as your wallpaper) and widget (you can put direct link to app on your home screen)! "Add Ghost to Photo" is adjusted to high resolution (HD 1080x1920) screens and tablets. If you have any problems with this app please report it to us and we will fix it as fast as we can!

App features: * Realistic 3D graphics and animation * Simple and handy controls * Free cube rotation in all axis * Global leaderboard. Share your time with whole world! * It let to continue solving after closing the application * It's FREE! Used images from site: http://www.visualpharm.com/

description: Free version can only scan 300 words, and full version can free download 2 transtar dictionaries and unlimited scan. A smart tool for learning foreign languages. Point your phone's camera at any word and Worldictionary will instantly define and translate it. No need to manually type words or take pictures. This app will be your indispensable travel tool primed to give you translation on-the-go. Otherwise, we also support Stardic format dictionary. 1. The instant "View and Translate" feature allows you to get instant translation simply by pointing your phone's camera at a word you want to look up. 2. Worldictionary recognizes and translates 15 languages, ranging from: Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, French, Germany, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Swedish, Finnish, Danish, and Norwegian. No need to type any words to look it up! 3. To proceed with looking up additional words or knowing more about the usage of particular words, you can first snap a picture of the text and then point the word you want to look up in focus one by one. 4. Optionally, you can select an image from your phone to get the translation immediately without typing words in. 5. Worldictionary automatically saves your search records. You can even build your own word database to increase translation efficiency. 6. Provide Google/Wikipedia/YouTube Search 7. Provide translation of phrases. 8. Support audio pronunciation for 15 languages. Please Note: free/full version, Network connection is required.
release_text: 2015/7/28 1. Bug fixes 2015/5/22 1. Online dictionary function bug modification 2. Bug fixes 2015/4/7 1. Add more recognition language(Indonesian/Vietnamese/Greek/Turkish/Arabic) 2. Support more online translation language 3. Improvement UI of Bookmark and History 4. bug fixes

description: Configurable Boating trip checklist / planner with everything needed to plan sailing trips. Comes pre-populated with more than 340 boating/sailing related items. Check/uncheck and reuse everytime you go on yachts/boats. Save all the time typing the list. Easy and very intuitive thumb friendly check/uncheck options. PLEASE NOTE: All the features listed in the description are INCLUDED with the purchase. The in-app purchase option is used only if you want to purchase additional templates (in addition to boating trip). The app does NOT need internet connection. Your privacy is guaranteed. We back our app with 100% refund ANYTIME beyond the refund window. If you are not satisfied for any reason, just send us an email. New Features! - Tablet support. Quick navigation - just swipe right to reveal the left pane. "Quick add" features. You can add notes, quantity and an additional measurement. Auto sort ability. Checkout more features below. Features include: - Tablet support. - Quick navigation. For small screen devices, just swipe right to reveal the left pane. - Create new lists from factory templates in minutes. - Add/Edit or delete lists/items/categories. - Quickly add item or category from the same screen with the "Quick Add" feature. - Add Notes, Quantity and an additional measurement (weight/volume/temperature etc) for each item. - Hide/Unhide checked items, move checked to bottom/top. - Ability to delete all checked items. - "Add After This" or "Add Before This" option to insert items wherever you want and quickly. - Password protect from prying eyes. - Option to check all/uncheck all so you can reuse the list again. - Copy or Move between lists, categories and items. Quickly creates your own personal list in matter of minutes. - Auto Sort either in ascending or descending order. - Rearrange items/categories/lists using drag/drop. - Indicates the total number of items and the number of items that need to be completed. - Color coded (green, yellow and red) for a visually appealing presentation - Export/Backup all lists to external storage and import them back when needed. - Edit your list on your computer and import it back. - Easily email with your friends / family using any sharing client you have on your device. - Send and share via Bluetooth to any bluetooth enabled device - Easily send to your printer (via email - Needs email to print support on your printer)
release_text: This version introduces quite a lot of upgrades that we hope you will enjoy: - Tablet support. Swipe right to reveal left pane. - Option to purchase more templates. - Action Bar for all menu options. - Auto Sort options. - Drag/Drop for rearranging. - Quick Add feature. - Add Notes, Quantity and addt'l measurement for each item. - Multiple Checked item options - Move items to bottom/top, show all, hide checked - Delete All checked items.

Popular puzzle game that came from the nineteenth century. We will collect the pyramid of the figures of the same color and at the same time to use the least amount of moves. An interesting modification of the classical Towers of Hanoi task. How to play: - Grab the figure and move it to the available space. - In one step it is allowed to move only one figure. - Do not place a larger figure on a smaller one and figures of the same size on each other. - You can build a pyramid of figures of different colors. - It is impossible to put figures on destroyed pedestals. Features: The difference from the classical Towers of Hanoi task is the fact that at different levels we will use a different number of pieces (depending on complexity) and different number of pedestals: 3 to 5. The game is to go through the levels, the task in which become more complicated as they pass. After completing each level the player is rewarded with points and coins. Points positioned player in the overall league table. Coins can be spent on tricks that will help to pass the level with the best result. Only 1 person of 1000 can pass the last level and get the gold medal! Maybe that's you this genius? Let's play!

*** THIS APP IS ABSOLUTELY FREE FOR ALL USERS *** Zoho Writer is a powerful rich-text editor for Android devices. This App allows you to create impressive documents seamlessly with its intuitive user interface and rich set of features. You can either save these documents in local device in MS Word format or push it to cloud devices like Zoho Docs, Google Drive and Dropbox. This app also allows you to open MS Word documents in your device. User can easily access and edit documents from Cloud Services like Zoho Docs, Google Drive and Dropbox. What Zoho Writer App provides for users Rich Text Editing features Ø Supports formatting of text which includes Font type, Font size, Bold, Italic and Underline, Fore color and Background color. Ø Create hyperlink, comments for text and bookmarks. The sequel to the critically acclaimed vertical shmup blasts onto Android! Danmaku Unlimited 2 brings a modern, original take on the classic Japanese arcade genre rarely seen on mobile devices! Climb the ranks as you pilot the powerful Senko fighter to destroy legions of enemies in a hailstorm of bullets! Continue the saga as you fight to uncover powerful relics from the old war and unravel the secrets surrounding the Valkyrias! Available on Android, iOS devices and PC. Support the game on Steam Greenlight! http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=160831164 ____________ REVIEWS "Absolutely beautiful" 5/5 - AppAdvice "Intensely beautiful" 4.5/5 Editor's choice - 148Apps "Gorgeous and addictive entry into the bullet-hell genre" 8/10 Silver award - Pocket Gamer "Danmaku Unlimited 2 is a must own" - AppShack "This one is just right" - Kotaku ____________ FEATURES -Authentic indie J-STG bullet-hell action. -Pure vertical shoot'em up in the vein of classic Japanese arcade titles -Battle countless enemies as you fight across 5 beautiful, action-packed stages -Weave and dodge against unique, exhilarating bullet patterns in epic multi-phase boss battles. -Level up and outfit the powerful Senko fighter to suit your personal play-style! -Unique innovative swipe controls built for a perfect mobile shooter experience. -Music by the talented Japanese indie group BLANKFIELD -4 levels of difficulty -Choose between 2 full-featured game modes -Bonus features: Go for a challenge in the Boss Rush mode or practice your skills in the Free Play mode. -Compete for international leader-board dominance on Google Game Service -Tons of achievements to unlock! -Adjustable screen-size and control sensitivity -HD/SD mode available in one app TROUBLESHOOTING - the game is recommended for Galaxgy S2 class devices or newer. - the game requires an additional 16MB in storage space to cache some of the game assets. Try freeing up some space if you are having trouble running the game.
