Der Nettolohn.de Gehaltsrechner als kostenlose App Nach dem großen Erfolg der App für das iPhone (rund 1.000 Bewertungen mit 4,5 von 5 Sternen) ab sofort auch mit dem Android Smartphone immer „Vorher wissen, was netto in der Tüte bleibt!“ Der Gehaltsrechner von Nettolohn.de für Android Handys berechnet jederzeit Ihr Nettogehalt. Basierend auf der aktuellen Lohnsteuertabelle und entsprechend der aktuellen Gesetzeslage eignet sich die kostenlose App bestens, um Ihre letzte Lohnabrechnung zu prüfen oder um das zukünftige Nettoeinkommen zu errechnen. Daneben dient Ihnen der Gehaltsrechner Nettolohn.de als solide und zuverlässige Grundlage für erfolgreiche Gehaltsgespräche mit Arbeitgebern. Bei der Berechnung des Nettogehalts berücksichtigt der Gehaltsrechner von Nettolohn.de sämtliche steuerlichen Konditionen. Ob Steuerklasse, Kinder- und Steuerfreibetrag oder Kranken- und Pflegeversicherung sowie Arbeitslosen- und Rentenversicherung, Kirchensteuer und betriebliche Altersvorsorge – der Gehaltsrechner lässt nichts aus. Fachbegriffe rund um die Berechnung des Nettoeinkommens werden auf Wunsch leicht verständlich erklärt und räumen mögliche Unklarheiten schnell aus dem Weg, sodass sicher keine Fragen offen bleiben. Die Bedienung des Gehaltsrechners könnte nicht leichter sein. Durch die Erlaubnis für die Standortbestimmung per WLAN/Mobilfunknetz, entfällt sogar die Eingabe des jeweiligen Bundeslandes, da der Standort automatisch lokalisiert wird. Im Anschluss geben Sie Ihr aktuelles beziehungsweise zukünftiges Bruttoeinkommen ein, das gewünschten Abrechnungszeitfenster sowie Ihre Steuerklasse, Ihr Alter und gegebenenfalls die Anzahl Ihrer Kinder und die Kirchensteuer. Die App errechnet nun in Sekundenschnelle Ihr Nettogehalt. Um bei der Berechnung Ihres Nettolohns das für Sie bestmögliche Ergebnis zu erzielen, können Sie beliebig Änderungen vornehmen und verschiedene Varianten durchspielen. Experimentieren Sie und verfolgen Sie mit, wie sich Ihre unterschiedlichen Eingaben jeweils auf Ihren Nettolohn auswirken, um festzustellen, ob sich beispielsweise ein Steuerklassenwechsel für Sie lohnen würde oder wie viel bei einer möglichen Gehaltserhöhung netto noch in der Lohntüte bleiben würde. Der Gehaltsrechner von Nettolohn.de bietet Ihnen aber noch mehr. Wenn Sie die Höhe der monatlich zu zahlenden Lohnsteuer, des Solidaritätszuschlags oder der Kirchensteuer interessiert, so zeigt Ihnen der Rechner diese Daten ebenfalls sofort an. Außerdem können Sie detailliert die Beträge einsehen, die Ihr Arbeitgeber zu Ihrem Bruttolohn zuzahlen muss – ein Feature, dass besonders Arbeitgebern gute Dienste leistet. Sie können den Gehaltsrechner bei bestehender Internet-Verbindung jederzeit nutzen. Die Online-Nutzung des Rechners bietet Ihnen den großen Vorteil, dass mögliche Gesetzesneuerungen unmittelbar in Ihre Berechnungen mit einfließen können und Ihnen ein Höchstmaß an Aktualität garantieren. Da der Rechner bereits vor dem Jahreswechsel integriert wird, und zwar sobald die neuen Berechnungssätze vorliegen, können Sie schon im Vorfeld sehen, wie sich Ihr Nettogehalt voraussichtlich im neuen Jahr entwickeln wird. Außerdem können Sie sich auf Wunsch die Gehaltsberechnungen für die beiden vorausgegangenen Jahre jederzeit problemlos anzeigen lassen. Der Gehaltsrechner von Nettolohn.de steht Ihnen zusätzlich auf dem Finanzportal Nettolohn.de zur Verfügung. Zudem bietet Ihnen Nettolohn.de einen umfangreichen Gehaltsvergleich sowie Gehaltsstatistiken, ein Lexikon zum Gehalt und zur Privatversicherung, Informationen zu vielen verschiedenen Berufen und ein Online-Magazin mit interessanten Beiträgen rund um das Thema Finanzen und Steuern. Weitere praktische Rechner unterstützen Sie beispielsweise bei der optimalen Wahl der Steuerklasse oder um mögliche Folgen von Kurz- oder Teilzeitarbeit auf Ihr Nettoeinkommen einsehen zu können. Based on the current payroll tax table, and according to current legislation, the free app is best to check your last pay slip, or to calculate the future net income. In addition to the salary calculator you Nettolohn.de serves as a solid and reliable foundation for successful salary discussions with employers. In calculating the net salary calculator takes into account the content of Nettolohn.de all tax rates. Whether tax class, child and tax allowance or health and nursing care as well as unemployment and pension insurance, church tax and company pensions - the salary calculator leaves nothing out. Technical terms related to the calculation of net income are explained in easy to understand and clear desire possible ambiguities quickly out of the way, so certainly no question remains unanswered. Afterwards you enter your current or future gross income, the required settlement time frame, and your tax bracket, your age and where appropriate, the number of children and the church tax. Experiment and pursue with you what effect your different inputs each on your take-home pay, to determine whether worthwhile example of a tax class change for you or would remain as much in a possible salary increase net still in the pay packet would. The content of computer Nettolohn.de offers even more. You can also see in detail the amounts that must be paid to your employer your gross salary - a feature that most employers provide good services. You can use the salary calculator when an Internet connection at any time. Online use of the computer offers the great advantage that possible legislative innovations can be incorporated directly into your calculations and guarantee a high level of relevance. Because the system is integrated before the turn of the year, and that as soon as the new calculation records, you can already see in advance how your net salary is expected to develop in the new year. You can also can view the content on demand calculations for the previous two years at any time. The content of computer Nettolohn.de you can also use the financial portal Nettolohn.de available. We offer you a comprehensive Nettolohn.de salary comparison and salary statistics, an encyclopedia on the content and private insurance information to many different professions and an online magazine with interesting articles on the subject of finance and taxation. Other practical computer will help, for example, the optimal choice of the tax class or to the possible consequences of short-or part-time work to see your net income can.

TrueWeather animates the current weather, day and night as a live wallpaper for your phone or tablet. The weather is reported for your current location or specified cities. The live wallpaper is animated in full HD. Main features of full version are: - Current weather situation. - Four different animated live wallpapers for 4 seasons (spring, summer, autumn, winter). Season is automatically selected depending on your location and date. - 5 waterfalls themes. - Accurate animation of sunrise and sunset. - The current phase of the moon. - Choice of two weather providers. - 6 or 10-day forecast, depending on the weather provider (start with double tap on the wallpaper, see video). - Feels like temperature. - Wind speed and direction - Humidity - Quick access to 2nd city(triple tap wallpaper) - Lots of settings - Amazing interactive animation - Rain, Snow depends on the wind speed, etc... - Optimization for CPU and Battery usage - Portrait & Landscape mode - Weather data in 21 languages (English, Italian, Russian, Spanish, French, German, Dutch, Norwegian, Czech, Arabic, Thai, Turkish, Polish, Hungarian, Finnish, Slovak, Hindi, Japanese, Romanian, Portuguese and Korean) Tip: How to set TrueWeather, Waterfalls wallpaper? 1. Press HOME button 2. Press MENU button 3. Tap on Wallpaper -> Live wallpapers 4. TrueWeather, Waterfalls -> wait a few seconds! 5. Set wallpaper Tip: How to change wallpaper theme (background)?: 1. Go to TrueWeather wallpaper settings (HOME->MENU->Wallpaper->Live Wallpapers->TrueWeather, Waterfalls->Settings...) 2. Scroll to Year seasons theme 3. Select year season theme (Spring, Summer, Autumn, Winter or Bonus) 4. Scroll to and press "Save" button 5. Press Home button and wait a few seconds Tip: To reduce battery consumption set FPS to 20 or 30 in TrueWeather, Waterfalls advanced wallpaper settings) If you have any questions or suggestions do not hesitate to contact us ( info@vivoti.com ). P.S. If you like our app, please rate it with 5 stars. Thank you.

description: Простое и удобное приложение для подготовки к экзамену в ГИБДД. В билетах учтены все изменения 2015 года! Также предусмотрена возможность получить все билеты приложения бесплатно. Помни! Для проверки карты Google списывает 1 USD, который будет возвращен. Успешной сдачи экзамена! Wolf Jigsaw Puzzles is a fun jigsaw puzzle game suit for whole family, PLAY THE BEST JIGSAW PUZZLE GAMES! The goal of the puzzle is to collect the pieces of the picture. The puzzle is solved, when all parts are correctly assembled in the picture. Why "Check in" to a location when you can Pillage? Introducing, MyndQuest! The new GPS, GeoLocation-based checkin app! It's a virtual scavenger hunt! - Strongly influenced by the app formerly known as Gowalla, you can: - Found new Spots and Locations - Check in (or Pillage and Defend) - Unlock location-based GeoQuests (States/Provinces/Countries) - Get random items, drop them, swap them at other locations, or just collect them. You might find a glass of wine or maybe an Escaped Convict! You might even find Corruption! Either way, it's yours to keep or trade. - Defend against other users who will pillage your locatons and may take control of them. - Look out for disruptive barbarians (a random computer element) who are out to capture your spots! - Every time that you travel to a new country, state, province, etc, you will earn a GeoQuest badge! So get out and explore! - Ability to upload user profile pictures and add friends! See where your friends go and what items they have collected! - MyndQuest is ultimately a social app; with some Geolocation gaming elements. - Push Notifications to notify you of friend activity and pillaging warnings **** THIS APP REQUIRES GPS AND/OR LOCATION SERVICES TO BE ON DISCLAIMER: Since this is very new, there is a large chance you will be the only one in the area with it installed. Therefore, it is up to YOU to begin creating spots and map out the world. this app requires a minimum of two local users before you see the benefits! So get a friend going on it too! This app uses both Miles and Kilometers based on user settings. Requires a FREE user account to access. Simply enter a username/password/email and you're set up! Requires Android 4.1+ PERMISSIONS: many of the permissions in this app are required to access your Google+ account information but ONLY if you choose to log in and give permission once inside the app. We also use Google Cloud Messaging which requires several permissions to send status bar push notifications between users. Lastly, we need the GPS and internet permission, because, honestly, without the internet and your location, this would not be an app. Developed by KickingLettuce Studios; the app is currently ad-free.

description: You don't have to know anything about Hindi to use L-Lingo Hindi to equip yourself to converse in Hindi. In our 65 lessons, you have the option to learn in the Hindi script, or in the Latin characters familiar from Western European countries. L-Lingo is designed to be easy to use. It exploits multimedia channels - words, recordings of native speech, and pictures - to enable you to grasp Hindi words and phrases useful on the road, when mingling with Hindi speakers, in day-to-day or family life, and when working. - Thousands of words and sentences -all visualized with images - Full native speaker pronunciation - Clear and easy to understand design of the program - Switch between Hindi Script or the more easy to read Phonetic Script - Grammar Notes See a pineapple in a supermarket, and the correct Hindi word pops into your head! Thanks to L-Lingo, you have learned the word visually, as well as by listening and reading. Our Hindi lessons make you learn Hindi words and phrases quickly. Before you know it, you can easily utter Hindi words and Hindi sentences! L-Lingo immerses you in the sights and sounds of the Hindi language, rather than just the written word. The multi-channel learning approach achieves results much quicker than traditional textbook approaches. Our Hindi 65 lessons cover the following: - Introductions & Greetings - At Home - At the Airport - At the Hotel - Colors - Food - At the Office - Professions - Numbers - Clothes - Telling the Time in Hindi - Animals - Meals and Cooking - Asking Questions in Hindi - Buying and Selling - Landscapes and Nature - Weather - Sports - Family and Relationships - Countries and Continents - Seasons - Shopping - Days, Weeks, Months etc. - Quantities and Shapes - Present, Past and Future tenses Any problems or have feedback on how to improve the App, email us before negative comment. We will reply quickly. http://l-lingo.com/helpdesk

developer: Thematica - educational and fun apps for kids
description: Dear friends, Thematica launches its’ new space project – Space Mission! So now you can touch the space! Let’s fuel the gasoline tank, place astronauts inside and fire the rocket into the outer space! Playing the Space Mission, your kid will have a chance to imagine himself as an astronaut. From Mars to Moon, there are a lot of capturing ways to play. There are so many interesting things to do! You’ll have an opportunity to collect unique minerals and space ground, transmitting it to the Earth Base for further research. You’ll meet friendly aliens and learn a bit about their world. And you’ll also be able to become a space captain and to drive different types of space vehicles. We have tried to make all the vehicles look very similar to the real ones. Kids will be able to learn not only the external view of the space vehicles but also some of their real life functions. In the app you’ll find 5 interesting astrovehicles: -Mars rover -Moon rover -Rock’n’drilling rover -Module transporter -Rocket launching system Features: -The app is for kids from 3 years old. -Stimulates kid’s creativity and problem-solving skills. -Makes the educational process about space vehicles unusual and interesting. -Has colorful graphics and exciting sounds. -Kid-friendly gameplay. -Has a variety of very interesting tasks. We love to hear from parents – and from kids too! To let us know how we made a difference in your kid's education, please rate our app and post a comment.

Football Transfer Centre lists every transfer since 1992 for 50 clubs in the English Premier League and Football League. This powerful analysis tool details transfer records, league tables, club transfer histories and all the latest football news. A must for all football fanatics out there! Features: - 20 seasons of in-depth transfer statistics for 50 teams. - Compare money spent with league position and points won. - Club by club transfer spend rankings. - Managers transfer spend rankings. - Recording sales and signings per club. - Live football transfer news feed via BBC Sport - Share transfer stats via social networks Featured football teams: Premiership - Arsenal - Aston Villa - Chelsea - Everton - Fulham - Liverpool - Man City - Man United - Newcastle - Norwich - QPR - Reading - Southampton - Stoke - Sunderland - Swansea - Tottenham Hotspur - West Brom - West Ham - Wigan Football League - Barnsley - Birmingham - Blackburn - Blackpool - Bolton - Bradford - Brighton - Bristol City - Burnley - Cardiff - Charlton - Crystal Palace - Derby - Huddersfield - Hull City - Ipswich - Leeds - Leicester - Middlesbrough - Millwall - MK Dons - Nottingham Forest - Oldham - Peterborough - Portsmouth - Sheffield United - Sheffield Wed - Swindon - Watford - Wolves The figures are as accurate as possible. If you find a missing or incorrectly recorder transfer please contact us via Twitter: @OptaTransfers Disclaimer: This is not an official Opta app.
release_text: Version 2.2 - Bug fixes - Improved user interface and navigation. - Interactive league tables. - 2012 summer transfer window update. - Compare money spent with league position and points won. - Added 30 new clubs to transfer history records. - Organised clubs in Premier League and Football League. - You can now share transfer stats via social networks.

Play Baby Hazel Parrot Care game on your favorite smartphone for free. Baby Hazel is fond of pet animals. As she wanted to keep a pet bird in her home, Baby Hazel’s uncle gifted her a parrot. Bruno, the pet puppy is jealous of Charlie, the parrot, as he sees Hazel paying more attention to him. So Bruno and Charlie keep frightening each other. Oh no…. today, Charlie got hurt when he had a petty fight with Bruno. He needs urgent treatment for the wound. Help Baby Hazel to treat Charlie for his wound. When he is cured, fill confidence in him to fly high again. Later pamper him by giving a birdie bath. Happy Birdie Day with Baby Hazel and Charlie!

THIS IS VERSION 1 (LEGACY) AND IS NO LONGER SUPPORTED. LOOK FOR VERSION 3 HERE: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.bajasim.atc4real.pro **************************** ATC4Real is the most realistic ATC Simulator for Android. It gathers real airplanes flights timetables so you could control only real aircrafts in your radar screen. No fictional flights were added. You will be able to simulate an ATC officer shift in Miami International Airport KMIA. The scenery was based in real data navigation so you could practice real STARs and SID procedures. Lead every arrival into the actives runways and clear them to land and guide all departures into their exit fixes. Features: - ATC4Real simulates approach and departure control plus take off and landing runways assignment in KMIA airspace. - Real flight data gathered from real timetables (Not in realtime). - Timetables are updated often. - All controls are reachable through your touch so you do not need any keyboard input for main functions. - Separated strips for Arrivals and departures. - Toggle radar screen elements visibility. - Terrain heights simulated, avoid crashing into mountains! - Fixes and vors are accurate placed so you can practice instrument procedures published for KMIA airport. - Real weather updated every 10 minutes (Requires internet connection). - Satellite image as background optional. - There is no pause button just as in real life. - Zoom feature so you can do precise vectors. - Ranking system So start controlling now, play ATC4Real Miami HD and have a lot of fun! Visit www.atc4real.com and check out all our airports. Compatibility: - We suggest you to install our free versions first to check your mobile device compatibility. - Adobe Air is required (Free download). You could be prompt to install it when starting. - This application has been designed for best viewing in HD tablets. Resolution 1024x768. Smaller resolution version is coming soon. Developed by Bajasim Keywords: KMIA, airplane games, aircrafts, atc, control tower, radar, flights, atc simulator, tracon, live atc,

Horsemanship is a never ending education. Working in harmony with a horse is an art form, but it’s not meant to be rocket science. Understanding your horse’s perspective, being able to work with your horse in his time and always remembering that your horse has a reason for everything he does, are just some of the basic fundamentals of good horsemanship. Behind every great horse is a great trainer, and behind every great trainer is good horsemanship. This app contains: • An introduction to Good Horsemanship • Groundwork, including exercises in catching your horse, leading, standing still, good manners, riding preparations, touching all over, confidence, stopping, hindquarter and forequarter yields • Training horses • Food • Turnout & stabling • Feet & farriers • Principals • Getting ‘on the bit’ and working with the horse • Ridden work • Solving problems • Changed behaviour • Safety • Not all about the money • The ‘why’ • Should I buy a horse • Mature or young horse • The perfect fit • I want a pony • Irish Horsemanship Note this app will need internet access on your device during installation.

Treasure Hunter is a classic puzzle game that combines match-3 and Rubik’s Cube game mechanics. You can slide lines of jewels to form great chains of one’s color and blow it up with a single touch! This excellent Fruit themed game, "Fruit Sequence", is going to help you as it will allow you to practice your intellectual facilities and concentration. The game contains two modes: Practice and Challenge. In the Practice game mode, there are three levels to choose from: Easy, Normal and Hard. They vary in terms of the number of fruits (3, 4 or 5) whose order of appearance the player must remember. If you choose this game mode, you must remember the order in which fruits, shown later on the plates below, appear on the screen. Touch the screen, the plates go blank and you must indicate fruits you see in the same order as they appeared on the plates. Easy, isn't it? Once you become skilled, try something more difficult and go to the Challenge game mode. In this mode, you must remember in which order fruits appear on the screen and then indicate them in exactly the same order. Each sequence which you remember correctly earns you a point. Scoreloop is available. So you can compete for the first place in the ranking of the world's best players.

The Basic/EMT task of AED is fully illustrated using 3D graphics and the critical skills are tested using interactive exercises. This AED lesson includes: proper CPR/questioning technique, how/where to attach pads, how to properly analyze the situation and provide shock and additional CPR as well as correct transport protocol. Medrills, presented by Archie MD, provides compelling training material for preventive and general medical tasks such as obtaining IV access, performing CPR, or using an AED. The app is dedicated to an individual medical task and includes: 1. An instructional animation providing a deep understanding of the medical task. 2. Training with interactive exercises which enable practicing the task to prepare for assessment. 3. In app purchase of $.99 for a testing section to evaluate the user’s knowledge and skill of a task. Score above 85% with no critical task failures to receive a certificate for nationally recognized 1 CEH credit hours certified by CECBEMS. NOTE – IN ORDER TO RECEIVE CEH CREDIT HOURS AN ADDITIONAL CHARGE OF : $0.99 MUST BE MADE AS AN IN-APP PURCHASE. USERS WHO DO NOT PURCHASE THE CEH AND TESTING MODE MAY VIEW THE INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEO AND TRAINING MODE BUTWILL NOT BE PARTICIPATING IN A CECBEMS ACCREDITED COURSE. CECBEMS verifies that sound education principles have been demonstrated in the development of this educational offering as evidenced by the review of its objectives, teaching plan, faculty, and program evaluation processes. CECBEMS does not endorse or support the actual opinions or material content as presented by the speaker(s) and/or sponsoring organization.
release_text: Added Testing and certification mode. Receive 1 CEH basic hour for scoring an 85% or higher in testing mode.

description: National Bank’s mobile app lets you manage your money, pay bills, transfer funds and access all your important banking information, instantly and in real time. description: Spanish <> English Dictionary ( Both Spanish to English and English to Spanish ) 100 % offline and free . You can search both English and Spanish words. You can search words directly from “Internet Browser” or other Applications by Sharing option. In sharing option you will find “Spanish Dictionary” and choosing “Spanish Dictionary” will open the dictionary with the shared word so you need not type and exiting from dictionary will return you to “Internet Browser” or other Applications again. This is not only a Dictionary but also a learning tool. You can use this dictionary when you have no internet connection. MCQ (Multiple Choice Question) option available. There is auto suggestion so you need not type full words. You also can use Speech to text feature . You can add words to study plan. And also you can remove words from study plan. You can turn on/off auto search going to setting of the app. So low profile Mobile handset can turn off Auto search to type quickly. Did you know that your mobile can speak Canadian French? Have Chantal read aloud texts from your e-book, navigation, translation and other apps in a female Canadian French, high quality and natural-sounding voice powered by SVOX. When combined with TTS-enabled apps, Chantal can: - give directions, allowing you to keep your eyes on the road while you're driving - read a notification containing the caller / sender's name, and read the content of an incoming call / sms / mms / email - read aloud your favorite e-books or pdf documents - help you learn French by reading aloud the correct pronunciation and much more… the possibilities are limitless! Browse http://svoxmobilevoices.wordpress.com for a list of compatible apps and voice demos. NEW! Pronunciation correction feature: correct the default output according to your preferences! == INSTRUCTIONS == 1. Install and run the voice app once 2. Install free SVOX Classic Text-to-Speech Engine 3. Go to Android Settings -> Voice Input & Output -> Text-to-Speech settings. Activate SvoxClassic at the bottom of the screen. Select SvoxClassic as the Default Engine. 4. Run the voice app, click “Continue”, then follow the instructions. 5. Your SVOX Voice main screen will be now visible. Don’t forget to try the new pronunciations correction feature (‘pencil’ icon)! 6. Download other free / paid apps to combine our voice with. For example, you could try: Google Navigation (on Android 2.2 and later, only with Navigation < 5.9), Moon+ Reader PRO, Voice Actions Plus, TalkToMe Classic, Book Speech Audio Books, Transzilla, Good Morning, WakeVoice... Browse http://svoxmobilevoices.wordpress.com/faq/ for a list of frequently asked questions. And now … enjoy your new SVOX voice! == PRONUNCIATION CORRECTION FEATURE - HOW TO == 1. Run the voice app 2. Click on the ‘pencil’ icon. The pronunciation correction screen will now be shown. 3. Tap on the Android menu key and select ‘Help’ == NOTES == 1. Google Navigation requires that the Text-to-Speech voice matches the phone language. You can change the phone language in Android Settings -> Language & keyboard -> Select language Compatible with Google Navigation version < 5.9 2. On Android 2.1 and earlier, only some apps, like Google Translation, support changing voices.

This application allows you to calculate the volume of the wells (the result will be reflected in cubic meters, rounded to one-thousandth of a, i.e. up to a liter), as well as any of pipe columns, including drilling and tubing, without the use of complex programs and in the field conditions. For calculation it is necessary to know the data on three parameters - this the depth of wells wells or pipe columns in meters, nominal diameter of the open hole or outside diameter any of pipe columns in millimeters, wall thickness carried pipe columns in millimeters (subject to calculate the internal volume of pipe columns).

HandWrite Pro is a note-taking app for your finger or stylus, but it is also an advanced vector-based drawing app. Smooth writing and drawing is enabled using the “Scribmaster” drawing engine. Easily markup PDFs to fill out forms, edit or grade papers and sign documents with the new PDF import. You can either use your fingertips, an active pen (e.g. the stylus from the Samsung Galaxy Note series) or a passive pen. The vector graphics engine allows you to zoom in without pixelation or losing quality. If you use a stylus you can set the "stylus only" option so that your wrist won't accidentally draw lines. The app also allows you to export your work for refinement on a PC later. The app allows you to write or draw during lectures and meetings. Export to PDF afterwards to share your work. The simple and intuitive user interface makes writing or drawing as easy as on paper. Just give it a try. Most of the features are available for free! Free Features: • Draw with an active Stylus (e.g. Samsung Note S-Pen) for pressure sensitivity** • Simulate variable line width with your finger or a passive pen using the "speed pen" option • Vector graphics engine, lossless zoom • Copy & Paste • PDF export • JPG & PNG export • Export directly to Evernote • Image import • Endless page size or different paper sizes • Two finger pinch-to-zoom or canvas movement • Use layers as in professional imaging software • Vector point manipulation • Organize your documents with labels like "work", "art" and so on. Premium Features* • Economy Package All premium features in one package • Export Package Export your drawing into the SVG format. You can refine your drawings on your PC with Inkscape (a free open source tool) or Adobe Illustrator Import PDF files • Feature Package Fill-pen Calligraphic pen Fill option for forms (rectangle, ellipse) HandWrite Pro is perfect for your next lecture or meeting! In case you experience bugs, please email us at info@hand-write.com with a short description. There is a discussion forum at our homepage at http://www.hand-write.com or just visit our facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/HandWrite . * Available via in-app purchasing ** Devices: S-Pen: Samsung Galaxy Note, Note 2, Note 3, Note 8.0, Note 10.1, Note 10.1 2014 Edition, and Note Pro, Nvidia Directstylus Others: Lenovo Thinkpad Tablet

This educational game is aimed at children ages 3, 4, and 5 years old and develops logical reasoning, which is the ability to recognize and classify the important properties of objects. Each round there are 4 objects presented on the screen, 3 of which have something in common— thus uniting them into a category. The category always has a name (for example: furniture, toys, fruits). The fourth object doesn't belong to that category and is "not like the others"—the kids need to identify it. Categories of objects found in the game include toys, dishes, tools, clothes, school supplies, flowers, mushrooms, fruits, vegetables, sweets, mammals, birds, insects, and marine creatures. This logic game systematizes the child's knowledge about the world, and improves the ability to abstract and solidify concepts. Teachers and parents can download and install the game for free on their Android phones or tablets. Hedgehog Academy develops fun educational games and puzzles for kids, and each of them has a free Android version. Check our website ( www.hedgehogacademy.com ) and follow us on Facebook to get updates about new upcoming kids games.

Do you feel online Google Maps is too slow showing you the map? Do you want an easy way to mark and remember where you are? Do you need a list of streets where you are? You don’t want to carry around a big unwieldy paper map? Tired of having the paper map blown to pieces by the wind every time you try to figure out where you are and where you need to go? The mobile streetmaps are for you! All the map data is loaded on your phone before you leave your home, so can you be on the streets, offline, and still know everything about the area you are in, and locate yourself or any street in the city. You don’t need any network connection at all once the application is installed on your phone – no WiFi, no 3G, no GPRS! This is a complete street level map for your phone. The entire map is stored on your phone, so it works where you have no access to the Internet - it works where Google Maps is inaccessible. This prevents expensive data roaming charges by loading all the map data to your phone before you leave home. You can turn off all network functions and still be able to find your way around. Lets you find all streets, and many useful locations such as ATM's, parkings, museums, and many others. Map data (c) OpenStreetMap and contributors, CC-BY-SA.

description: This is the official mobile app of the Denver Broncos. Make your Android mobile device a unique part of your game-day experience for Broncos games. Want to catch breaking news of the team? See real-time statistics for every drive? Watch video-on-demand clips of press conferences and player interviews? Follow post-game blogs and pre-game previews of the matchups? Now, you can stay in touch with the Broncos anytime, anywhere, on your Android device. Features include: - News: Real-time breaking news from the Broncos, previews of upcoming matchups, post-game blogs - Video: Video-on-demand clips of the Broncos' press conferences, coach and player interviews - Photos: Gallery of game-time action - Audio: Podcasts - Stats: Real-time statistics and scores from the official NFL stats engine, head-to-head stats of the matchup, player stats, drive-by-drive stats, box score, out-of-town scores around the league - Standings: Division and conference standings - Fantasy: Keep track of your favorite fantasy players - Depth chart: Shown by offense, defense and special teams - Social media: Aggregated twitter of the Broncos' official tweets, check in to the stadium on game-day, one-click tweet of all media items, one-click facebook posting of all media items - Digital keepsake: Your game-time moment superimposed on the stadium jumbotron in the form of a unique digital keepsake - Schedule: Schedule of upcoming games, and scores/stats of previous games from the season, ticket purchase for games - Evolving home-screen: Pre-game, in-game, post-game, off-season countdown, draft-day Follow us @Denver_Broncos on Twitter for updates or visit www.denverbroncos.com. description: "Text It" makes sending SMS group messages fun and easy. Most other Text Pro or Text Plus apps stores your contact information in their server. This app stores all your SMS distribution lists right in your phone and it does not need data service or wifi. This protects your privacy and security. Batch messaging cannot be easier. It minimizes your typing effort. You don't have to type a single letter to forward a text message to a group or an individual. Here are the features: 1.Select the recipients by clicking on checkboxes. 2.No need to sign up / log in to a 3rd party server. Protect your privacy. 3."Save" or "Save as" distribution lists created. 4.Edit and update groups for texting. 5.Forward a message from your texting history to a group or an individual.
release_text: V1.6 reduce image resolution to conserve memory and keep display in Portrait. V1.5 added EXIT function which is the BACK key in the main screen. When there are updates in contacts, you can EXIT and restart this app to refresh the contact list.With Text It, you do not need to sign up / log in to a 3rd party server - protect your privacy. Create and maintain your distribution lists right in your phone. Send group text messages from your phone to your friends - no middle person.

description: OpenRice is Hong Kong’s Most Popular Dining Guide You Can’t Miss! * Comprehensive information with over 40,000 restaurants and 650,000 reviews * Search for restaurants by using keyword, cuisine, district, type of restaurants, price range and other special features * Navigate the restaurants nearby with GPS * Share restaurant info via copy to clipboard, Email, SMS, Facebook, Twitter, Weibo, etc * Search for restaurants available for online booking * Over 100 discount coupons from various types of restaurants (include mobile coupons) Comment & Enquiry: mobile@OpenRice.com If you get the ‘Package File Invalid’ issue when install our App in Android device, please visit our Editor Blog http://forum.openrice.com/blog/?p=573 for more details.

Soccer Games-Football Kick is an arcade soccer game based on the FIFA World Cup. Let's get the World Cup 2014 season started, now!Pick your dream team first and defeat other teams to take the lead in the World Cup League table! Much fun! Soccer World Cup features 73 teams' countries. Each team enters a "Regional Qualifying Round Final" where it plays a team it actually played in the 1998 FIFA World Cup qualification. For example: Spain would face Yugoslavia, an opponent it actually faced in its qualifying group. Or Italy would face Russia, an opponent Italy faced in the UEFA play-offs. If the player beats the opponent, it goes to a group much like the real life World Cup. In fact, the team faces opponents that were actually in its group. For example: Mexico would face the Netherlands, Belgium and South Korea. It is a re-make of Super Sidekicks 3. However, animations and designs were exactly the same. The only difference is teams to reflect the World Cup, kits again to reflect the World Cup, and players to resemble squads from the World Cup (teams that did not qualify use line-ups from friendly games and qualifiers). Its slogan is "We got the kick".

LIVESCORE Live scores directly from the source, the 1st live score service on the Internet, powered by LiveScore.com since 1998. This application comes directly from LiveScore Ltd., the leaders and inventors of real-time delivery of live sport data and owners of the no.1 ranked football / soccer web site globally. FEATURES - Live football / soccer scores from leagues, cup competitions and championships worldwide - More than 1000 live football / soccer games followed live every week during the season - Detailed match information - Live tennis, basketball, ice hockey & cricket scores - Live league tables for football, hockey and basketball - Select your own refresh period - User friendly - Time & Date localized - Very fast and responsive even on slow connection - Minimal data transfers - Bandwidth friendly with our data compression - Lightweight - Free REQUIREMENTS Android OS 2.0.1 (or higher) required.
release_text: Version 2.1.4 - Promotion / relegation phases in league tables - Added league / tournament fixtures and results - Improved navigation on paged screens - added previous & next page names - Additional info in football / soccer match details (referee, venue, substitute players) - Re-designed Settings, added a possibility to choose default sport, which is shown when the app is started

description: Discover a completely redesigned euronews LIVE app! euronews LIVE is the live streaming app of Euronews, the most-watched news channel in Europe. EURONEWS LIVE OFFERS • euronews TV in live streaming • World news 24/7 • News bulletins every 30 mins • Breaking news as it happens • Business, culture and sports news • Exclusive reports from around the globe • Weather updates • 13-language editions • And much more… EURONEWS LIVE’S SPECIAL FEATURES • New video player • Smart alert if your device volume is set to 0 THE EURONEWS LIVE APP IS AVAILABLE IN 13 EDITIONS • English • Arabic • French • German • Greek • Hungarian • Italian • Persian • Portuguese • Russian • Spanish • Turkish • Ukrainian HELP US MAKE EURONEWS LIVE BETTER Thanks for your support and useful comments! We are building those apps for you and strive to enhance your experience using them: so don’t hesitate to share your ideas and feedback anytime. We will listen and respond: appsupport@euronews.com ABOUT US euronews is the most watched news channel in Europe. We cover world news from a European perspective, since 1993. With 400 journalists and correspondents of more than 30 nationalities, euronews is available 24/7 in 13 language editions. A truly independent media hub, euronews offers a unique and diverse perspective on news, favoring facts and analysis over emotions. We reach 415 million homes in 156 countries and are available across all platforms (web, mobile, connected TVs, radio, YouTube, Google Glass, Flipboard…), as well as on board airlines, cruise lines and in hotels. JOIN US ALSO ON • http://www.euronews.com • http://facebook.com/euronews • http://twitter.com/euronews • http://youtube.com/euronews DISCOVER & DOWNLOAD THE EURONEWS APPS http://www.euronews.com/apps

description: Read the latest local news, sports and entertainment on-the-go with the Ottawa SUN+ app. Take the top Ottawa SUN headlines with you - anywhere, anytime - and stay connected to the news that matters. Ottawa's local news, sports and entertainment are all in the palm of your hand. We have made it easier to enjoy even more content! We have opened up all the content channels so that all users can browse to their favourite content. While some content is always free, you can now also read up to 10 complimentary SUN+ stories each month. For an enhanced, unlimited SUN experience, take advantage of a SUN+ To-Go in-app upgrade. Existing Ottawa SUN print or e-edition subscribers are entitled to full SUN+ access for free. The SUN+ Mobile App provides insider access to in-depth local news, hard-hitting columnists, live sports commentary, exclusive Sunshine Girl videos, unlimited social sharing and investigative journalism by experienced reporters. Share articles with friends through your favorite social media platform, read articles offline and get inside Ottawa!

Siamese Cat Live Wallpaper is a little animated and interactive siamese cat on your home screen! If kitty feels down you can comfort him, he purrs and meows. Change themes from snowy to fireflies and customize Siamese Cat in many ways! Lots of options and accessories - hats, glasses, necklaces and other details to change and combine.

Acquire real-time information from clubs around the world, as well as the latest trends (1) “KUVO FEED” to acquire accurate information on tracks currently playing at clubs This function allows clubbers to check up on tracks being played at clubs around the world, or details of DJs playing in real-time. They can then listen to demo versions of tracks, and jump to Online Music Store to purchase a track. In addition to messages from DJs or clubs that are playing tunes or browsing the profiles of DJs, clubbers can follow their favorite clubs or DJs, register their favorite musical tastes and display the latest information on their own account screen. (2) “Discover” to uncover the latest trends in tracks or DJs around the world This function provides updates on the latest trends in clubs, DJs or tracks from around the world, with “Trending” based on the number of clubbers pressing “Like” for tracks or playlists played at clubs, or “Most Liked” based on “Like” or “Follower” numbers. (3) “Playlist” that shows information on tracks played by favorite DJs This function allows clubbers to check or search for tracks that their favorite DJs have played, or tracks that were played at events held in the past. Comments can also be added to playlists or sent directly to the DJs, giving clubbers an experience like they were there at the actual event. (4) “Club Map” to show potential clubs nearby The “Club Map” function displays tracks being played in each region, or DJ details in real-time on a map, which allows clubbers to easily find a club that suits their current mood or that is playing tracks that they want to hear. Tracks can be played from the club information playlist, and clubbers can check up on event information released by the club. (5) “Photo Album” to share pictures with information taken at clubs The “KUVO App” comes with the “Photo Album” function that stamps pictures taken at clubs with the current name of the track being played, the DJ name and the club name. Data from when a picture was taken can be saved easily, making it simple to clearly recall memorable moments from a club. Pictures that have been taken can be sent as is by email, and include a “share” button to upload pictures to social media.

Navigate gravity shifts, bounce pads, portals, cannons, and more in this easy to play but difficult to master puzzle game. When the scientist’s away, you and his robot Steve can play! Help launch Steve through more than 200 levels of physics-based puzzles to collect stars and unlock new challenges. Gravity Lab contains hours of new levels and mechanics and a store featuring fun, customizable looks for Steve and extra lives for the all new ‘Robot Blast’ bonus game. To see Gravity Lab! in action check out our YouTube channel: http://www.youtube.com/mobilesnap Follow us on Twitter: @mobilesnap For more information or support, please visit www.mobilesnap.com

Offline Directory + quiz victorine(new) of all the countries of the world. It contains basic and detailed information about all countries of the world. It also contains information about the oceans, seas, all monetary units, types of government, regions, international organizations, languages, and about many other things. Does not require Internet connection. Easy to use. Has a search by country name and other criteria. Suitable for any student as a geographical encyclopedia, and for anyone who wants to enrich their knowledge of geography. Great for frequent travelers and people traveling abroad. The main categories of information: The region in which the country is located; Type of government; The capital of the country; Area; Geographic data; Climate; Population (number, nationality); Religion; Population growth in the year; Life expectancy at birth; The population density; Formal and informal language; Data on the currency; International phone; International organizations; The political state; Seas and oceans; Support: countries-info@yandex.ru

description: Daily English. Totally and 100% free. Hundreds of courses (videos) with many subjects: * Learn English via conversation: - English For You - English Today - Let's Talk in English - Follow Me - BBC - Learn English Step 1,2,3 - The best English - Speak English With Misterduncan * Exam Preparation: TOEIC, TOEFL, IELTS,... * Pronunciation, idioms, English common phrases, grammar, ... Tafsir al-Qur'an al-Azim, popularly Tafsir ibn Kathir is a classic Sunni Islam tafsir (commentary of the Qur'an) by Ibn Kathir. It is considered to be a summary of the earlier tafsir by al-Tabari, Tafsir al-Tabari. It is especially popular because it uses the hadith to explain each verse and chapter of the Qur'an. It has been translated into many languages including English,Bengali, and Urdu. This app contains tafsirs of individual suras in extracted pdfs. An external pdf reader is needed to read the files. Content Source: http://www.quran4u.com/

description: Are you smart enough to solve this game ? "Light Up The Bulbs" is highly addictive logic/brain/puzzle game which guarantees you will spend few days in playing! The point of the game is to connect (light up) all bulbs. You can connect only horizontal, vertical and diagonal. There are 50 levels for now, but more will be added soon. Each level has different combination of bulbs, so it's hard to light up all of them. "Light Up The Bulbs" is absolutely free. FEATURES: ★ FREE TO PLAY! ★ HD Graphics! ★ Awesome random piano sounds! ★ 50 EASY AND HARD LEVELS! ★ Earn stars for solving levels quickly! ★ Hint button. ★ Undo button. ★ DOUBLE BULBS! If you enjoy logic / brain / puzzle games, "Light Up The Bulbs" is the right game for you! Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Light-Up-The-Bulbs/650304968338424

NS Pairs is a classic memory game, also known as Memorize, Concentration, Pelmanism, Shinkei-suijaku, Match Up or simply Pairs. It is a card game where all of the cards are laid face down on a surface and two cards are flipped face up on every game turn. The objective of this game is to turn over pairs of matching cards. Train your concentration and memory using this game. There are 2 free levels (4x4, 5x5) and 2 premium levels (6x6 and 7x7).

PlayMemories Mobile is a free application that makes your Wi-Fi compatible Sony camera use more convenient. You can enjoy the following features by connecting your camera with a smartphone or tablet via Wi-Fi. ■Send photos and videos to your smartphone -You can easily send photos or videos taken with the camera to your smartphone. -High quality images shot with the camera can be shared on your favorite SNS or web service. ■Remote shooting from your smartphone -You can remotely control the camera from your smartphone while watching the contents of the camera screen on the smartphone screen. -This is a useful shooting style when you take group photos or selfies. -You can also intuitively control the camera, making it useful when taking a photo or video in situations where you don’t want to be holding the camera directly: such as night scenes or macro photography. (*Availble for selected models) -Using the smartphone’s location information service, you can add the location info to the saved photo on the smartphone while remote shooting. ■For users of the “Lens-style Camera” -With this application, you can operate various settings of the camera from your smartphone: viewing the subject, shooting, zoom, touch-AF, etc. -For more information about the products, please visit our website: http://www.sony.net/lensstylecamera/ ■Notes -Operating environment: Android4.0-5.1 -This application is not guaranteed to work on all smartphones and tablets. -Available functions can vary according to the connected camera. -For details about the compatible cameras and available functions, please visit our support page: http://www.sony.net/pmm/

★ 화제의 아이즐 CD그림책, 베스트 도서에 빛나는 『영어동요』 드디어 앱 출시! ★ 자장노래에 이은 아이즐 CD 그림책 시리즈 그 두번째! ★ 자연 악기연주와 원어민 전문가수가 직접 부른 최고의 영어동요! ---------- *지원해상도: -WVGA(480*800px) ---------- 『영어동요』에 삽입된 모든 곡은 순수 자연악기로 연주되고, 원어민 전문가수가 정확한 발음으로 노래하여, 어린이들이 직접 노래를 듣고 부르며 자연스럽게 영어를 습득할 수 있도록 도와주는 영어교육의 확실한 첫걸음이 될 것 입니다. ★ 우리아이 영어 교육 첫걸음을 위한 최고의 선물 ‘영어동요’ -세계화의 첫걸음! 영어 문화권의 문화를 경험할 수 있습니다. 유아에게 다른 나라의 동요를 들려주는 것은 세계화 교육 또는 다문화 교육의 한 부분입니다. 유아에게 영어 동요를 들려주면 아이가 어려서부터 영어를 친숙하게 느낄 수 있을 뿐만 아니라 영어 문화권의 문화를 경험할 수 있습니다. -영어 동요를 듣고 부르면 그 활동을 통해 언어 능력도 발달하게 됩니다. 영어 동요를 듣고 부르면 반복되는 후렴구나 유희적인 소리 사용 등으로 인해 언어의 아름다움과 즐거움을 느끼게 하고 심미감이 발달하게 됩니다. 영어동요에 반복되는 운율과 리듬을 익혀 청각적인 변별력과 듣기 기술을 길러주며, 따라부르는 활동을 통해 언어 능력도 발달하게 합니다. -영어전래동요를 통해 영어 낱말이나 문장의 의미를 아이가 쉽게 이해할 수 있습니다. 전래동요는 오랫동안 구전되어 오면서 쉽게 외워지도록 만들어져서 읽기나 수세기 등을 재미있게 익힐 수 있게 하고 유아의 인지적 발달에도 도움이 됩니다. ★★★ 재미있는 영어동요를 통해 아이들에게 영어교육과 언어발달을 동시에 키워 줄 수 있는 아이즐 『영어동요』 App 을 만나보세요. ------------------------------------------------------- [『영어동요』 App만의 특징] 1) 노래 듣기 재미있는 그림과 터치 인터렉션으로, 아이에게 『영어동요』 를 들려주세요. 2) 노래 부르기 따라 부르기, 녹음하기 : 아이와 함께 반주에 맞춰 노래를 불러보세요. 아이와 엄마가 함께 동요를 따라 부르고 녹음하여 들음으로써 아이의 영어교육에 큰 도움을 줄 수 있습니다. 3) 악기놀이 탬버린, 작은북, 심벌즈 등 다양한 악기를 연주하며 아이의 리듬감을 키워주세요. ======================================================= APP 문의: appsupport@mirae-n.com / help@waterbear.co.kr 출판: 배움, 즐거움, 삶의 풍요로움을 창조하는 문화 기업 Mirae-N (주) 미래엔 (www.mirae-n.com) 개발: “톡톡톡, 내 손안의 놀라운 학습 경험” Waterbear Soft inc. Change up to 270 graphical assets in a fully integrated and easy-to-use experience. Subscribe to our newsletter for new and exclusive content: http://orangepixel.net/subscribe ------------------- Community forum: http://www.orangepixel.net/forum/viewforum.php?id=4 ------- A dungeon full of skulls, imps, cyclops, minotaurs, flameheads, spikes, secrets and much, much more is now ready for you.. the Hero! http://www.heroesofloot.com ---- ★ TouchArcade Game of the week - “one of those perfect games that you can whip out at a moment’s notice and know you’ll have a blast, or sit back with and really get sucked into” ★ Pocketgamer Gold award - “It’s fun, funny, and it fits perfectly into your pocket.” ★148Apps 4.5/5 - “Heroes of Loot is about as close to pure, distilled arcadey dungeon-crawling joy as we’re ever likely to get.” --- From the guys behind Gunslugs and Meganoid comes a brand new adventure: Heroes of Loot is a dungeon-game like no other. Every time you play the dungeon will be different, every time you become better, the dungeon will also grow and become more dangerous.. this game will never end! unless you die of course.. Features: - Unlimited amount of randomly generated dungeons - Random quests to reward you with extra loot, items, experience, and more - Four classes to choose from: Elf, Warrior, Wizard and Valkyrie - Secret area's - Special mysterious dungeon items - A large collection of loot and items to acquire and aid you in your quest - Always changing gameplay ** BUGS if you run into problems or the game wont work on your device, instead of just rating 1 star, you could help us fix it by providing feedback! Xperia PLAY Optimized MOGA controller supported Green Throttle controller supported (2 player coop mode available!) NVidia Shield supported +Google Play Game services

description: Pixel Media Server is UPNP/DLNA compatible Digital Media Server on Android Platform (SmartPhone, Tablet, STB/TV). It shares digital media contents, such as Images (JPEG/PNG), songs (MP3, WAVE, FLAC, AAC, M4A etc.), videos (AVI, MP4, 3GP, MPEG, MPG, MKV, FLV, TS, MOV, M4V, RM, RMVB etc.) from your Android Device (SmartPhone/Tablet/Set-Top-Box) and make those contents available on wired/wireless network for other UPNP/DLNA compliant/certified devices, such as SmartTV, BlueRayPlayer, XBOX, Play Station, Android TV/STB/Player and many more devices. Pixel Media Server (Pixel DMS) can be discovered from home network using Digital Media Controller (DMC) or Digital Media Player (DMP). Using DMC or DMP, user can browse all media contents which are shared on Pixel Media Server from your Android Smart Phone/ Tablet and media contents can play back to "dlna-compliant" Render or Player, such as TV etc. There is no need for additional Media Servers, if you have Pixel Media Server running on your Android SmartPhone/ Tablet/ Set-Top-Box. Pixel Media Server is tested with well known UPNP/DLNA compliant/certified devices and various Android platform. Features: * "UPNP/DLNA" Compatible Digital Media Server for Android Platform * Support SSDP protocol for DMS discovery * User can Start DMS and Stop DMS with a single click from your Android phone * Share your complete mobile contents or select your desire folder * Set your DMS name as you wish * App autostart on device boot * On screen message for WiFi on/off * On screen message for DMS on/off * Keep track last folder selection from the server for next application launching * Support multiple device connections for media streaming from DMS * Pixel Media Server runs on Android Phones and Tablets and Android Set-Top-Box * Support multiple external storage device selection * Support popular video file formats: MKV, AVI, MPG, MP4, M4V, MPEG, TS etc. * Extended M3U playlist file supported. [you can share other servers contents (any HTTP server) to your network from Pixel Media Server] * Support WiFi/Tethering/Ethernet * Image Thumbnail * Video Thumbnail * Music AlbumArt * Support Subtitle (only SRT) Please provide your valuable feedback on Pixel Media Server (v 6.0). Please have a look for our other "dlna-compliant" apps on Android platform from CMC Limited. Digital Media Controller: "Pixel Media Controller – DLNA" Digital Media Renderer: "Pixel Media Renderer – DLNA DMR" Printing controller (+PR1+): "CMC DLNA Print Client" Daily Utility App: Scanner and Fax : "CMC Image Scanner" For any queries or issue related to Pixel Media server , please send e-mail to android@cmcltd.com We are happy to help you. Disclaimer: This app is not DLNA certified solution and this app is not claiming that "App has passed interoperability testing standards approved, endorsed or sponsored by DLNA". This application is not certified by DLNA Organization (www.dlna.org) or its associate partner and we are not listed Member Company of this organization. DLNA® is trade mark of DLNA Organization.

description: Your personal Instagram Dashboard - watch the development and stats of your Instagram account! Watch your follower, backfollower, total and average likes, total und average comments and even more. Features: - see all important stats - compare to previous dates - see development in linegraphs - see all user you are following and followed by - see your non-backfollower and your follower you don't follow back - unfollow or follow user directly from this app - see other users Instagram profile and their recent media All you have to do: Sign in with your Instagram Account! click on numbers => show graph click on blue buttons below numbers => show user => follow or unfollow click on blue buttons below numbers => show user => click on profile pic => shows profile click on compare Data => select date to compare the values with click on menue => click on "Save current Data" => current values are saved LOCALLY on your device click on menue => click on "Refresh" => refresh data click on menue => click on "Delete Data" => select data to delete This is my first App - I hope you like it! :)

description: Mom is busy pampering baby Matt, which makes Baby Hazel feel lone and left out. But mom understand that Hazel is upset so she decides to pamper her little princess with a royal bath. Baby Hazel enjoys a soothing massage first. Then mom soaks her in chocolate and milk bubbles. Finally, dress up Hazel in nice costume and accessories and get her ready for dance class. Keep Hazel happy Mom is busy attending the needs of baby Matt and have no time to entertain Baby Hazel. This makes her feel sad and lone. Can you with Baby Hazel and fulfill her needs? Give a gentle massage to Baby Hazel Time for Baby Hazel to have soothing massage! Can you help mom in giving a gentle massage to Hazel? Pay heed to all the needs of Hazel to keep her happy. Baby Hazel enjoys a royal bath Baby Hazel is happy to have soothing massage and now it's time to bathe her. Mom is busy getting ready the costumes for Hazel so help Hazel in taking shower. Soak little princess in chocolate bubble first and then in milk. Keep Hazel happy by fulfilling her needs on time. Dress up Hazel in good looking outfits Wow! Baby Hazel is feeling energetic and fresh after a enjoying a royal bath. Now help mom in dressing up Hazel in favorite costume and accessories and get her ready for the dance class. Play Baby Hazel Royal Bath game online on Topbabygames at : http://www.topbabygames.com/baby-hazel-royal-bath.html Play Baby Hazel Royal Bath game online on Babyhazelgames at : http://www.babyhazelgames.com/games/baby-hazel-royal-bath.html Play video at : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QJl0hRzGfrg Visit us – http://www.axisentertainment.org/ Follow us – https://twitter.com/topbabygames Like us – https://www.facebook.com/babyhazelgames

DRAE es la aplicación oficial que la Real Academia Española pone a su disposición a través de la editorial Espasa Calpe para conectarse al Diccionario de la lengua española. Resuelva al instante y de forma fácil cualquier duda sobre cómo se escribe una palabra, accediendo directamente a la base informática de datos de la Real Academia Española. Explore, con una interfaz ágil e intuitiva, las múltiples posibilidades de consulta (por lemas y formas; sin acentos, diéresis ni mayúsculas; aproximada, y escalonada, que combina las tres posibilidades anteriores), aplicada al conjunto siempre actualizado de las más de 80 000 artículos y a las formas conjugadas de los verbos. DRAE is the official application to the Royal Spanish Academy makes available through the publisher Espasa Calpe to connect to the Dictionary of the Spanish language. Solve instantly and easily any questions about how to spell a word, going directly to the computer database of the Royal Spanish Academy. Explore, with a flexible and intuitive interface, the multiple possibilities of query (for slogans and forms, without accents, umlauts and uppercase; approximate, and staggered, which combines the three previous possibilities), applied to all updated whenever more than 80 000 articles and conjugated forms of verbs.

description: Social Notification is the fastest way to share your thoughts on Twitter or with other apps. Social Notification creates an always-on notification that, when touched, will let you type your text and share directly to Twitter or even with other apps, like GMail or your Facebook app. With Social Notification, you don't have to close the app you're currently using to share your thoughts with the world. You share, and then you're right back to the app you were using before! Features: -Always-on notification to quickly share your thoughts from anywhere -Post directly to Twitter, without the need to open your Twitter client -Share with any app you have that can handle text -Shorten links with bit.ly (you can even short the link without sharing it!) -Option to send a tweet again if it fails to send in the first time (beta) -Send DM's -Runs on Twitter API 1.1 Pro Features: -Option to auto-start the app when the system boots -DashClock Extension (Android 4.2) -Option to add location to your tweet (geolocation) -Upload a photo directly from the application -Expandable notification to quicly close/open the app (Android 4.1+) Pro version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vdlow.socialnotificationpro
release_text: v. 1.1.5 -Corrected a bug where the app's settings screen would open after interacting with the notification v. 1.1.4 -Added the DM button v. 1.1.2 -Slight UI changes v. 1.1.2 -UI tweaks v. 1.1.1 -Bug fixes -Better auto-resend feature v. 1.1 -Now the user is automatically prompted to login to Twitter when first using the app -A lot of background changes to improve the auto-resend tweets feature Complete changelog - http://socialnotificationchangelogs.blogspot.com.br/

description: Discover the world of camping in SA like never before! Explore all that South Africa has to offer by downloading our FREE WECAMP app. Use our app to find useful information on camping destinations in South Africa as well as get the latest special offers on camping destinations. Campsites from the leading holiday companies are featured on our App with the ffg: - reviews - ATM's - Petrol stations - Get Directions - Checklists - Special offers and more! Available for iOS and Google Android. You'll find our free app easy to use helping you locate, explore and enjoy a South African outdoors. Our app does NOT feature every campsite in South Africa but does include: ATM's, petrol stations, events as well as our featured campsites. View in list mode or on the map. Use the interactive maps to find your way around South Africa. With Facebook and Twitter integration you can message, shout and keep your friends up-to-date. Our app fully integrates with our latest news, reviews, travel tips and money saving offers and discounts available for this holiday and the next!

이 프로그램은 오주괘 1.0입니다. 점괘를 얻어서 길흉을 알아보려고 할 적에 점괘를 출력하여 보여주는 어플리케이션입니다. 오주괘에 대해서 사전에 공부가 되어있는 경우에 사용이 가능하며 일반적인 사주프로그램과는 다릅니다. 오주괘는 질문자가 질문하는 순간의 시간을 연월일시분으로 정하여 간지로 변환을 하여 보여주는 것입니다. 주의할 점은 여기에서 오주괘의 해석은 보여주지 않는다는 것입니다. 본 어플리케이션은 태블릿 화면에서 정상적인 작동을 지원하지 않습니다. 본 프로그램은 특허 제 10-0944826호로 특허청에 등록이 된 제품입니다. 임의로 제작하여 사용할 경우에 특허법에 저촉됨을 공지합니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : 010-2995-9522 충남 논산시 상월면 상도리 9-7
release_text: 버전 4.0.1 변경사항 4월19일 업데이트로 문제가 있엇던 년주 표시 오류가 정상화 되었습니다. 버전 4.0 변경사항 오주괘와 만세력에서 메모란을 추가하였습니다. 메모를 입력하고 저장을하면 이전기록 보기 메뉴에서 확인하실 수 있습니다. 버전 3.5-3.6 변경사항(2015. 3. 04) 화면 비율이 좌우로 넓은 스마트폰에서 데이터 입력이 원활하지 않은점을 수정하였습니다. 버전 3.4 변경사항(2015. 2. 18) 음평, 음윤을 음력, 윤달로 입력시 이름을 변경하였습니다. 버전 3.3 변경사항(2014. 11. 19) 특정 음력일의 입력에서 발생하던 문제를 수정하였습니다.

description: Defend the Castle is medieval castle defense game. The game has lots of levels and types of shells for catapult. Choose shell from top left corner of screen. Touch and move trigger of catapult and see changes of power. Then fight and attack enemies. New shells will be available in highest levels of the game. To get more scores try to change the shell during the game. Defend the Castle is totally free game!!! You can submit your score online to compete with players all over the world.
release_text: Support for large screens. Continue to play from the last level. Added Google Play Game Services.

description: Join Little Critter in this interactive book app as he tries hard to get through his day without forgetting anything! Explore pictures, learn new vocabulary, and follow along with three fun ways to read! Every young child will understand Little Critter's confusion and laugh with him from start to finish! Explore I Just Forgot - Little Critter: - ENCOURAGE literacy skills with highlighted narration - FOLLOW along with three fun ways to read! - LEARN new vocabulary with tappable words - TAP objects to hear their name read aloud Designed for children ages 2-5 ------------------------------------------------------------------------ The Reviews Are In: - "Fabulous" - CNET - Young kids will enjoy the stories of Little Critter - PadGadget.com ------------------------------------------------------------------------ We'd Love To Hear From You! - Please share your thoughts in a review! Your experience matters to us. - Need tech support? Contact us at  support@omapp.com - Say hello to us on FB! facebook.com/oceanhousemedia Official Mercer Mayer licensed app: www.littlecritter.com

**READ: Only for use with the Theme Chooser, a custom, rooted ROM w/ this feature is needed to use this app!! >> Welcome to AlloyUI Red, a Theme Chooser theme with a dark metallic mix of buttons, sliders, checkboxes and more. Alloy takes Android's "Holo" style user interface and makes it more appealing by using design elements such as 3D style perspectives, new bevels/edges, ambient lighting and gradients. >> Supported screen DPI: [XHDPI][HDPI][MDPI][LDPI][Tablet/Phablet UI] >> Works on most CM sourced ROMs, including, CM10, CM10.1, AOKP, Paranoid Android, etc.. >> What's Theme Chooser & how to I apply this theme?: - Theme Chooser is theme engine included in popular custom ROMs such as CM10, AOKP, and many more. - Download and install this app and then navigate to Settings -> Themes -> Alloy Theme, and hit the "APPLY" button. >> TROUBLESHOOTING: - IF you see this error: "THIS THEME WAS IMPROPERLY COMPILED AND CANNOT BE APPLIED...", RE-APPLY the default "System" theme AND either: - REBOOT - OR, clear cache & data of "ThemesProvider.apk" & "ThemeChooser.apk", then apply the theme. - This error: "SORRY, THIS THEME IS MISSING ASSETS FOR YOUR DEVICES SCREEN SIZE," is HARMLESS, just ignore and select "APPLY ANYWAY." >> If you have any questions, theme requests, or issues, please contact me at: mac.dsigns49@gmail.com Or this thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1992980
release_text: AUGUST 27, 2013: - Brightness toggle indicator fixed - 4.3 Contacts issue partially fixed *(WIP:CM needs to merge contacts theme compatibility into CM10.2)

description: Have five random numbers, example "12345", you only need press number from left to right "12345" when have icon (>), and press right to left "54321" when have icon (<). . First, you have 5 seconds to complete the Sequence Numbers . From score 15, your have 3.5 seconds to complete the Sequence Numbers . From score 200 onwards your have only 3 seconds to complete the Sequence Numbers . The game has 6 colors to choose as you like It's easy and very interested. Let enjoy it. Please dont forget to vote and share top score

description: Origami is the traditional Japanese art of paper folding. This application will help you to make origami of zodiacal constellations. This zodiac origami was designed by Taiko Niwa. Origami instructions: - Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio (c) Taiko Niwa / Seibundo Shinkosha Publishing Co.,Ltd

CityRat's MUNI Rider not only predicts the arrival of your next bus/train, but allows you to set up notification for its arrival. Don't want to miss your train home while you finish up something in the office? Set up notification for five minutes before the next train or bus, and MUNI Rider will give you a ring. Turn on a daily alarm to be alerted few minutes before your train to work, no matter what time it is. 8:30, 5:00, 12:00 – MUNI Rider can be set to ring however many minutes before your desired train. Additionally, MUNI Rider saves your most recent stops for quick look up, and lets you to quickly browse, map and find the stops nearest to you. You can also scan Twitter messages related to your trip right from within this app: see what others are thinking, or why your train is 20 minutes late.
release_text: Release 1.7: 1. Nearby Stops revamped. Now you can immediately see predictions for top found stops in the list. 2. Twitter messages are displayed for each stop selection. 3. Post your own tweets: warn others of any problems with MUNI, share what's on your mind, etc. 4. Context menus for stops extended for easier navigation and My Stops management.

description: "As you become more clear about who you really are, you'll be better able to decide what is best for you - the first time around". Oprah Winfrey "A man who stands for nothing will fall for anything". Malcolm X "Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation". Michael Jordan "Achievements on the golf course are not what matters, decency and honesty are what matter." Tiger Woods Do you love these great quotes from some of the greatest African Americans who ever lived? Then you would love this quote app. Comprising of quotes from the most prominent African American Leaders, you can be sure to find quotes that inspires, motivates, or lift your spirits. There are definitely gems of wisdom in there you can learn from as well. Find some of your favorite quotes from the following African Americans: Rosa Parks Malcolm X Oprah Winfrey Maya Angelou Michael Jordan Kobe Bryant Tiger Woods Jimi Hendrix Kanye West Muhammad Ali Barack Obama Jesse Jackson Andrew Young Louis Armstrong Langston Hughes Zora Neale Hurston Did we miss out anyone? Email us to let us know and we will add them in at the soonest. Download this app today, and get the wisdom of the most prominent African American leaders in your pocket!

Kids can now easily make their own puzzles from photos with Puzzle Maker for Kids: Create Your Own Jigsaw Puzzles from Pictures! Do your kids love taking pictures? Do they love puzzles too? Look no further. Puzzle Maker for Kids: Create Your Own Jigsaw Puzzles is a fun puzzle game for toddlers, preschoolers, and kids from ages 1 to 6. Your child can now easily make a puzzle out of anything they want! They simply tap a puzzle and take a picture. Anything that they love such as toys, cars, animals, trucks, bugs, dinosaurs, and even you can become a puzzle. The app allows for twenty different child and toddler friendly, jigsaw-style puzzles with options to change the number of pieces and remove other helpers. The puzzles start off easy to play and get more challenging as they change the settings- perfect for the little one in your life who loves puzzles! Please note that this is the free version of the app. The free version includes four puzzles to use. You can unlock 16 more, the ability to change the number of pieces, and the ability to delete puzzles via one in-app purchase for the full version. Features: * Fun, creative graphics by illustrator Jenny Tiffany. * 20 different puzzles to create! * Positive encouragement. * Fun interactive stars or bubbles to pop at the end of each puzzle! * Choose your own difficulty! Increase the number of pieces from 9 up to 24 as your child's fine motor and spatial skills improve! * Easy for kids to use and control.
release_text: 2.05 * Fixed a bug that did not allow pictures to be gotten from the camera roll on some devices. 2.00 * New User Feature Request Added - You can now make puzzles from saved pictures on your device. You will need to enable this option in the Parents section to do so. 1.3 - Altered camera interface and fixed picture not loading on certain devices. 1.2 - Fixed an issue with the puzzles not displaying correctly on some devices.

description: PlayerGrid's FREE interactive Android application lets you keep track of multiple sports team schedules and events. It will notify you instantly, in the manner you choose (text, email or push notification) the moment a coach or manager adds, updates or cancels any event. Besides its interactive calendar, that syncs seamlessly with other popular calendars like iCal and Google, PlayerGrid features a team specific message center, photo gallery, roster, custom team merchandise and latest notifications panel. And everything in the PlayerGrid app syncs seamlessly with its popular web app. What makes PlayerGrid so welcome, especially for busy parents, is knowing all their children’s activities are dynamically updated in one convenient app accessible anywhere, anytime. With PlayerGrid, you get the peace of mind that you’ve always got the most updated activity schedule in the palm of your hand. PlayerGrid teams start with a coach or manager inviting all team members to a private and shared team on PlayerGrid. If you’re not a coach or manager, a simple invite process allows you to invite your coach to the 30-second signup process. Some of the powerful features in PlayerGrid include: * Automated push notifications for event updates * Interactive activity calendar that syncs with iCal, Google, etc. * Invite other coaches or team parents/players * Quickly create new teams and invite members * Team message center * Roster information and photos * Custom Team Merchandise * Multiple administrators can be assigned * Handles multiple teams and schedules * Customize settings to your preference

Have fun with Arts & Crafts, care for your puppies, help around the house, plan birthdays, and care for the babies! Dozens of coloring pages and stickers that you can add to your baby’s page! Cherish the best moments with your babies! Learn all about them as you play! We are celebrating the release of the 6th app from our baby series - Baby Arts & Crafts! Our babies grow up so fast! But you can keep your baby book and have fun with all the babies you’ve grown to love! Sophia, Ava, Emma, and Kim have been through so many adventures with you, and now it’s your chance to know them better! Play, Care, Read, Create! (and Don’t Forget the Puppies!) Now you can go through this baby arts & crafts book and relive all your wonderful moments with your baby girls. Clean the living room, Take a shower, Feed the dog, Plan a Birthday & Play outside! Lots of fun activities are waiting just for you! Color it all! Hours of amazing colorful fun await! There’s lots of coloring pages specific to the babies and what they had the most fun doing! You can color in with any color you want, fill in whole areas with just one tap, add cute little stickers wherever you want, and different kinds of brushes too! Save all your wonderful creations with one tap of a button, and show it to your friends and family! Scrapbook time! In your very own scrapbook, you can keep all the pictures, and all the coloring the pages that the girls and you have done together! You can easily start playing the game you love the most too! It’s all right there for you to enjoy with just one tap of your finger! You can take a look at all the dressups, and even all the times that you got the puppies in the dress up! Features: > Play apps with the babies you love! You get to enjoy all the awesome times that you had together all in one app! From dressup to dress up, from party to puppy, all the fun is here! > Now you can learn everything you ever wanted to about the babies > Relive glimpses of Mommy’s Little Helper, Babies and Puppies, Birthday Planner, and Baby clean up, all in one app! > Draw and color all over the coloring pages that come with the girls! Let your imagination run wild! > You can keep a scrapbook of memories, with your own picture with the baby too! What’s inside: > 4 Fun activities - Care with your puppies, help around the house, plan birthdays & care for the babies! > 4 Babies > 24 coloring pages! > 35 awesome stickers! > 34 colorful brushes! > 4 Book pages with a short story! description: Your entire fleet in the palm of your hand! X-Wing Companion (XWC) lets you browse every pilot, ship, maneuver dial, upgrade card and expansion pack available in X-Wing: The Miniatures Game from Fantasy Flight Games. BEAUTIFUL CARD IMAGES View every card in full detail! Card images are front and center in X-Wing Companion. EXPLORE UNRELEASED CONTENT Includes all known released and unreleased content. X-Wing Companion has all content for the all-new Scum and Villainy faction and the upcoming Imperial Raider Huge Ship! Get a head start on your opponents! WORKS OFFLINE X-Wing Companion does not need a internet connection. Use it wherever you want, whenever you want. BROWSE EXPANSION PACKS Don't know what to buy to get a copy of Advanced Sensors for your B-Wings? X-Wing Companion will tell you which expansion packs include the cards you want! Planned features: • SQUAD BUILDER: Perfect your squads on the go! • MY COLLECTION: Keep track of the sets that you own, and see which squads you can build. • Compatibility with more devices ----------------------------------------- Disclaimer: X-Wing: The Miniatures Game is a trademark of Fantasy Flight Games. X-Wing Companion is the work of a fan, and is not endorsed by Fantasy Flight Games, Lucasfilm Ltd. or Twentieth Century Fox and is intended for entertainment and information purposes only. Star Wars, the Star Wars logo, all names and pictures of Star Wars characters, vehicles and any other Star Wars related items are registered trademarks and/or copyrights of Lucasfilm Ltd., or their respective trademark and copyright holders. For more information on X-Wing: The Miniatures Game please visit http://www.fantasyflightgames.com/ .

The easiest to use navigation routeplanning system arround. Enter (or speak) your destination, press "Start Navigation" and your on your way. Spoken and text directions in Philippinian and 40+ languages. - Most user friendly GPS navigation system. - Door to Door navigation. - Multi language: Spoken and text directions in 40+ languages. - Speech destination entry. - Automatic route recalculation. - Zoom dependent on speed. - Online, always most accurate routes/maps. - Plan your route very easy

Match pairs of land animals, letters and sea creatures. - 3 themes - 10 levels - 3 difficult levels (easy, medium, hard) - Track high scores for multiple players This app shows ads on the initial launch screen only.
