description: From the developers of the first open source version of a Ventrilo client, we present the first unofficial Ventrilo version of the Android client. Mangler is an open source VOIP client capable of connecting to Ventrilo 3.x servers. The Mangler developers are the ones that worked hard to open up the Ventrilo protocol and allow this software on multiple platforms. Today, we are proud to offer Mangler on the Android platform as well. The Mangler developer team offers support as best we can (via our website, forums, and IRC) at no cost to our users. Our software is completely open source and we welcome any changes and improvements to provide a better experience. For more information on Mangler, please visit: http://www.mangler.org/android/

description: Live+ from Digotel Sarl is the app to watch live streaming and video on demand of sports and cultural events. It’s really easy to use - just tap a video channel and then one of the videos in it. The app contains “free” and “pay per view” videos and channels; those marked with a ++ symbol can be bought and unlocked with an “In App” purchase (Requires an account with Google Wallet). Here are more features which make Live+ the app for live streaming... - The live streams are delivered in multiple qualities for mobile (lower quality) and wifi (higher quality) viewing. The video stream will adapt to your bandwidth automatically. - Videos are organised by channels so you can quickly find the sports you’re interested in. Current channels include: - FIBT (Bobsleigh and Skeleton) - IBU (Biathlon) - ISU (Figure Skating, Short Track and Speed Skating) - FINA (Swimming, Diving and Water Polo) - Extreme Sports from Quattro Media (Freestyle and surf) - Live+ warns you if you are about to watch a video via your mobile provider. We recommend watching via WiFi to minimise costs. - Live+ contains videos that are geo-protected because of rights agreements. Live+ works out where you are and which videos you can watch or buy. Enjoy the best of live streaming and video on demand with Live+ !

description: The free Android application from A.Vogel give you the latest information about daily pollen in the air during the hayfever season (from March 1 to September 1). You can consult hayfever post today, but the forecast for the next 5 days for different locations in the UK. -Today: View the hayfever weather today on the map of the UK. Below the map you will find more information on the atmospheric conditions of today. -Expectation: View the forecast for the next 5 days for different locations in the UK and for different types of pollen: Birch, Cypress, Oak, Plane tree & Sweet Chestnut. Weeds such as nettle and Grass. -My Locations: Show the data based on your GPS data manually or select your preferences. -A.Vogel: Find information about Pollinosan : the product of A.Vogel hayfever. You can also find the nearest store that sells Pollinosan.

Bob Orange is a super fun 3D platform game for your mobile Android device. This Free Lite version contains no adware or nag screens and can be installed to an SD-Card. Created in the style of classic platformer games like Super Mario Bros, Kirby and Wonder Boy. This 3D side scroller is easy to pick up and play. The game is packed with machines and items including: Jetpacks, Helicopters, Tunnelers, Balloons, Canons, Catapults, Conveyers, Warp Gates, Speed Shoes and more. Jump down arcade pipes and play mini arcade machines to win extra life hearts. These cool arcade cabinets play the classic games like Space Invaders, Moon Buggy, Breakout and Grand Prix Racing. Controls are easy and responsive: left,right and jump. Hold down jump for extra height and hang time. If your device supports USB OTG cable (available on ebay for less than $10) then you can also plug any USB gamepad into your device and define the controls for that, giving a really great console experience. The game features user defined controls and you can hide the onscreen controls, perfect for gaming devices like the Xperia Play. The on-screen controls can be set narrow or wide for tablet or phone. You can hide the on-screen controls and then tap and slide anywhere on the screen to run and jump (recommended). 3 Play slots means friends and family can also work their way through the game, everyones progress is saved seperately. One tap camera button changes the zoom level of the game quickly and smoothly allowing for a map like overview or you can zoom right into the action. The game is 2.5D, this means that the map layouts are 2D but all of the models and animations are 3D, similar to Super New Mario Bros. The game works great on any screen orientation or size. You can lock the screen rotation (for playing on a couch or in bed) or allow it to follow device orientation. The full version of Bob Orange will keep any gamer happy for hours. Check out the video below to see actual gameplay of a demo level. Cheat codes are available for unlimited life, unlimited coins and all levels unlocked. So younger kids and toddlers can enjoy the game without too much frustration.
release_text: Can be installed on SD card.

description: This Clock is basic with lots of features. the 4 zooper clock tells you all the information that you want to know just by looking in one place. 4 Zooper clock informs you of the time, date, weather conditions, your battery life, the date, if you have missed calls, texts or emails.there are a lot of features on the way. How to install: -download and install zooper widget pro 2.38 or above -download and install halo 4 clock by gtaguitar7596 - Add a Zooper widget to your homescreen (via long press on homescreen if you are using a launcher or via app drawer if you're on stock ROM) - When Zooper widget skins list pops up, choose 4 clock.

A beautiful scene of Lake Bohinj reflecting in the calm relaxing waves of the lake. Flowers and grass in the foreground, birds in the air and a live sky with clouds, sun and moon depending on the time. Horizontal scrolling support on all devices. While the free version is beautiful and fully functional, most settings are locked. The full version is highly customizable with loads of settings and offers "real time" mode with seamless color transitions between all times of the day. Settings in full version: - Change background landscape - Wave Size - Automatically determine sunrise and sunset times, in order to make the sun move similar to the real sun in your location. - Surface Activity - Show/Hide Foreground - Background Distance - Select Flowers (Fall flowers or Summer flowers) - Flower Count + Settings for stars, sun, sunset, sunrise, moon, night sky brightness, night light intensity, time, clouds, wind speed, birds, bird hunt, performance, color depth, scroll speed and more... Lake Bohinj (Slovene: Bohinjsko jezero, German: Wocheiner See), covering 318 hectares (790 acres), is the largest permanent lake in Slovenia. It is located within the Bohinj Valley of the Julian Alps, in the northwestern Upper Carniola region, and part of Triglav National Park. Lake Bohinj is 4.2 km (2.6 mi) long and 1 km (0.62 mi) at its maximum width. It is a glacial lake dammed by a moraine. Contributors (flickr users): Lake Bohinj: Rosino Moon: Luis Argerich Thanks for the creative commons licenses!

description: Finding information is faster with Tulsa City-County Library’s mobile, instant access gateway. From library locations and hours to a world of electronic book downloads, we now provide the information anytime you need. Convenience is the key to connecting with a librarian, searching the library catalog, downloading the latest bestseller and sharing your insight with other readers. Join the library’s mobile community to follow the latest trending book topics in your area. Results for books, DVDs, audiobooks, CDs, periodicals and library events are available instantly. Renew items or place holds on your next library checkout and have it sent to the library of your convenience. Learn recommendations on what to read next from TCCL librarians at the forefront of information and publishing industries. Text a librarian your questions for quick answers with cited references. As information providers, our goal is to provide accurate and timely answers. Our newest mobile outreach is a tool that connects Tulsa’s community of library customers with a world of information.

A playful live wallpaper letting you multi-touch to add water ripples, quantize ( cartoon mode ), lens vignette, cross hatch, posterize, colorize, sepia tone ( old western style ), blurs, Sobel edge detection, Laplacian edge detection, erosion, dilation, sharpen, brighten, darken, black and white, color channel removal, negative, gamma correction, emboss, thermal imaging, pixellate, sketch, swirl, fish eye, torch, effects on live video from your front or back facing cameras. Toggling water sounds and vibration haptics in the settings menu. Double tap your home screen to capture an image or stream images to your sdcard. We hope you enjoy this live wallpaper from Samsung's Dallas Technology Lab.

description: Bodybuilding Workout Log is a very easy to use workout tracker application. The goal of this app is to allow you to workout and log your training results without looking at the phone all the time, with as little screen taps as possible. Pure training log! Both beginners and experienced lifters (in bodybuilding, power lifting or fitness) will benefit from this workout journal's simplicity and features which include: ★ free choice of workout exercises. You do not need to deal with a long list of exercises that you never use in your training. Add exercises that you love and name them in a way that is clear to you; ★ import of popular exercises for a quick start (as well as a sample routine); ★ saved training routines with pre-defined exercise selection; ★ dynamic training routines, where one can select exercises on the go; ★ comments/notes for sets; ★ always visible history of sets, reps, weight, comments and rest times (no need to interrupt your training to view previous history); ★ detailed workout history with a calendar and stats; ★ progress tracking with graphs for 1 rep max; ★ deletion of incorrectly logged workout sets; ★ rest timer with vibration and an optional sound notification, which is extremely useful if you train with headphones; ★ smart automatic rest interval selection ; ★ option to show best results from each workout only; ★ option to show results from the same routine only; ★ log of 1RM changes; ★ export of all workout history to a CSV file on the SD card; CSV files can be opened and processed with most spreadsheet editors; ★ summary of achievements displayed after training (including new records, total weight moved , training time, intensity); ★ sharing of summary screens (Facebook, email, SMS or any other sharing provider that is installed on your phone); ★ resuming of incomplete workouts; ★ performing supersets using back/forward navigation and comments; ★ smart pre-entering of weight for the next set; ★ backup and restore of all exercises and training history, you can move all created exercises and all training history to another device at any time. Please visit our site http://www.bbworkoutlog.com for news about new workout tracker features and version releases. Or follow us on twitter https://twitter.com/bbworkoutlog to get the latest updates. This application uses free icons from http://icomoon.io/ (CC 3.0 license)
release_text: 1.9.10 Fix training without a selected routine 1.9.8, 1.9.9 http://www.bbworkoutlog.com/blog/filtering-workout-history-by-routine/ Added filtering of workout log by a routine. Minor improvements 1.9.7 http://www.bbworkoutlog.com/blog/editing-workout-history/ Added editing of weights and reps in history. Fixed calculation of total moved weight in certain situations.

description: Geocache Hunter is a client for Geocaching.com. It supports paperless geocaching. With this application you can search for geocaches on the go. It assists you while geocaching. Application supports both Basic and Premium members of Geocaching.com. Basic members of Geocaching.com can download only 3 full geocache descriptions a day and about 6000 lite descriptions. Key functions: Search nearby geocaches Live map Recently viewed geocaches Creating logs and fieldnotes Offline content
release_text: 1.6 - fixed login issues - improved compatibility with some devices - added option to choose between imperial and metric system

description: If you want to simply read your source code with syntax highlighting, look up snippets or cool solutions on-the-go then Code Peeker is for you! It's a great little code reader (note: read, NOT an editor) that enhances current coding knowledge by highlighting your past coding expertise. This app has been selected to be part of the Google Play for Education program and currently used in schools as a teaching aid. With Code Peeker you can share coding success tricks during a job-interview or meetings. It'll make you look much better than promising "I don't know. Let me get back to you on that one". Code Peeker will open and highlight any supported code language (and unicode/utf-8) you throw at it. It'll also: - Mark the line number - Provides a built-in file browser (in case your phone doesn't have one) - Opens from both external SD and internal memory! - Supports other file browsers Code Peeker Pro includes: - Theming capabilities for easy reading - Access to recently opened files - Shortcut to quickly open files straight from the home screen - Ability to map unrecognised file extensions to known syntax formatting It supports a wide variety of new and old languages such as: - C/C++ (c, cc, cpp, h, hpp) - C# (c-sharp, csharp, cs) - CSS - Java - JavaScript (js, jscript) - PHP - Python (py) - Ruby (rails, ror) - XML (xml, xaml, xslt, html, xhtml) - ActionScript 3 (as3) - AppleScript - Cold Fusion - Delphi/Pascal - Diff/patch files - Erlang - Groovy - JavaFX (jfx) - Perl (pl) - PowerShell (ps) - Sass - Scala - SQL - Terminal scripts (bash, shell, sh, rc, conf) - Visual Basics (vb, vbnet) - Verilog & System Verilog (v, sv) If Code Peeker can't recognize the file extension, it'll give you the option to select a format or show the source as plain text (no color highlighting, but at least you still can read it). Got a feature request or a file that won't highlight properly? Just contact me via email (It's hard to communicate via Play Store comments) IMPORTANT: - It is 100% free code viewer. - No creepy permissions required. - No secret Internet connectivity required. - No ads! If you're happy with it and want to support me, please grab a copy of Code Peeker Pro =)
release_text: Please note I've made modifications so it now compiles with the Android Lollipop framework. If you see any strange behaviour, let me know v1.97 Pro - *new* Added text search! v1.97 Lite + Pro - *new* Added "Go To Line" number - *semi-fix* Prevent crash when trying to open from Google Drive (still doesn't open yet, need a big rewrite to open files properly) - changed default setting for "Exit on Close" to be false - various code tweaks for future changes (minimum Android 4.1 when v2.0 releases)

description: Hashi is a logic puzzle. Connect islands by horizontal and vertical single or double bridges such that in the end, all islands are connected with the indicated number. Note that bridges may not cross other bridges or go over islands. Note that the solution is always unique. You can get hints when stuck. Different sizes can be played and some further properties of the puzzles may be customized. Now there is also an expert mode where triple bridges are possible. You may choose between two color schemes (white on black or black on white).
release_text: New menu / settings dialog Sound volume can be adjusted Minor bug fixes (and sorry about the shameful 2012-02-28 version).

description: A complete Qur’an with 7 Urdu translations and 7 audio recitations with Urdu tarjuma. Includes specialized features for all users (from beginners to advanced), to read, recite and learn the Holy Qur’an in Urdu. It’s the most comprehensive Qur’an app in Urdu language ever designed for any smart phone or tablet. Seven Urdu translations to read, learn or compare and seven world famous reciters’ audios (Tilawat wa tarjuma in Urdu) make it unique among all other Qur’an apps on the Android market. Elegant Arabic and Urdu fonts, full screen mode and complete portrait and landscape support makes the Qur’an reading experience enjoyable. ★ Recitations (Tilawat wa Tarjuma in Urdu): ▪ Abdul Rahman Al-Sudais & Al-Shuraim ▪ Abdul Basit Abd us-Samad ▪ Sheikh Mishary bin Rashid Alafasy ▪ Sa'ad bin Said Al-Ghamdy ▪ Shaikh Ali Abdul Rahman Al Huzaifi ▪ Qari Waheed Zafar Qasmi ▪ Qari Sadaquat 'Ali ★ Translations (Text in Urdu - built-in) ▪ Fateh Muhammad Jalandhary ▪ Ahmed Ali ▪ Abul Aala Maoudodi ▪ Ashraf Ali Thanvi ▪ Muhammad Junagarhi ▪ Ahmed Raza Khan ▪ Allama Jawadi ★ Elegant and intuitive interface. ★ Multi-Touch surah index with a spacious and smooth tracking that lets you jump directly to display surah and to play audio. ★ Easy to use audio controls to listen Surahs with pause, FF and RW features in just a touch. ★ Display of Surah and selected translation(s) during playback. ★ Multiple translations display during playback for comparison and better understanding. ★ Transliteration of the complete Qur’an for people having difficulties to read Arabic. ★ Unlimited bookmarks, direct jump to bookmarked ayah and a separate Bookmark section to manage all the bookmarks. ★ Quick surah or verse jumping using a unique and easy to use sliding bar. ★ Sharp and crisp vector display and both Portrait and Landscape support in all screens ★ Full access to read, playback and translations while you are offline (no data connection). ★ Font size selection for Arabic and Urdu, language and full screen preferences through settings. ★ App is designed to install on SD card. ★ Plus much more.
release_text: ▪ Critical update for Galaxy Note 3 and few other devices running Android 4.3

description: Forget Wallpaper; say Wallpapyrus. Wallpapyrus enables you to set wallpapers on android platform without the fuss of cropping images every time you set a wallpaper. Just select the image to set wallpaper; no questions asked. All kinds of portrait or landscape images can be set as wallpaper. Wallapers can be set from all the familier places like from homescreen, gallery and file managers. Just select Wallpapyrus while selecting images. Scroll/ no-scroll option works on all launchers. Note: Wallpapyrus requires live-wallpaper support. How to set a live wallpaper: Go to settings -> Display -> Wallpaper -> Live wallpapers -> Wallpapyrus -> Set wallpaper. Purchase the pro version to support the developer. Pro version has no permission requirements and is lighter. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.vineetsirohi.wallpapyrus_lite.pro
release_text: 1.3 - fixed Kitkat bugs Please remember to set the app as live wallpaper. This is a requirement.

description: The mouse has to finds cheese in the maze cats. Can you help him find them all? If you find them, the big cheese will be available to you. But beware, there are levels where there is a cat running through the maze. If the cat gets to the piece of cheese first, you lost the game. There is also a very difficult level where there are snakes and birds walking through the maze as well!

description: ！！ゲーム発売に先駆けて先行配信！！ ☆『超女神信仰 ノワール 激神ブラックハート』きせかえホームアプリが登場☆ 壁紙やロック画面、ドロワーやアイコンなどを一括で激神ブラックハート仕様に大変身♪ ブラックハートやノワールが大好きなアナタにオススメです！ ☆「超女神信仰 ノワール 激神パック」登場キャラクター☆ ・ブラックハート ・ノワール＆モルー ・ノワール＆アイン・アル ・ノワール＆レディ・ワック ※壁紙に登場するキャラクターです。 ☆パック内容の詳細☆ ・壁紙：4枚 ・ロック画面：1枚 ・ドロワー背景：1枚 ・アイコン：10枚 ・ライブ壁紙：2枚 ※壁紙1枚、ロック画面、アイコン、ドロワー背景、ライブ壁紙1枚は「武将パック」と共通です。 ※アイコンはご使用機種により全て表示されない場合があります。 ☆新作や配信中のテーマはココをチェック☆ ・ネプテューヌ きせかえっ！紹介ページ http://www.compileheart.com/mobile/app/neptune_kisekae/ ☆きせかえ配信地域☆ 全世界配信(対応言語は日本語のみ) ☆注意事項☆ ※アプリのダウンロードには時間が掛かります。Wi-Fi通信でのダウンロードをお勧めします。 ※お問い合わせはページ下部「メールを送信」より、ご使用機種と症状を記載のうえ送信してください。 ※対応機種：Android OS2.1以上 ※非対応機種：MEDIAS W N-05E、他一部機種 ※This app is only available in Japanese. ※User support is only available in Japanese. ----------------------------------------------------------- ◎きせかえ設定方法 →｢設定｣アイコンを押す →｢本体設定」を押す →｢ホーム切替｣を押す →ダウンロードしたきせかえを選択する ◎壁紙変更方法 →｢設定｣アイコンを押す →｢壁紙・画面設定｣を押す →｢壁紙｣を押す →ダウンロードしたきせかえを選択する →好きなキャラクターを設定する ◎ライブ壁紙設定方法 →｢設定｣アイコンを押す →｢壁紙・画面設定｣を押す →｢壁紙｣を押す →｢ライブ壁紙｣を押す →ダウンロードしたきせかえを選択する →｢壁紙に設定｣を押す ※ご使用する機種やOSバージョンによりメニュー名や操作方法が違う場合があります。 ※ロック画面はOSバージョンにより以下の違いがあります。 【Android OS2.x系】 きせかえのロック画面に加え、ご使用機種のロック設定が表示されます。 予めご了承ください。 【Android OS4.x系】 ご使用機種のロック設定が優先されます。 きせかえのロック画面を設定する際は、ご使用機種のロック設定を「なし」に変更をお願いします。 ※壁紙変更時、壁紙とキャラの表示が想定とは違う場合があります。その際は「激神パック」内にある壁紙を再度設定、変更をお試しください。 ----------------------------------------------------------- ☆利用条件☆ このアプリケーション内で使用されているイラスト・画像の無断転載を固く禁じます。 すべてのイラスト・画像の著作権はIDEA FACTORY / COMPILE HEART / STINGに帰属します。 (C) 2014 IDEA FACTORY / COMPILE HEART / STING

This is the fastest camera available for Android. NOTE - this app is limited to non-color photos, due to the high capture speed. For high-speed color photos, try the "Fast Burst Camera" app. Ultra Burst Camera is capable of taking up to 40 photos per second on high-end phones - this is faster than most +$1000 DSLR cameras This app is specifically designed for situations that require detailed frame-by-frame information of an event : - sports photography - science experiements - elusive wildlife Hold shoot button for continuous burst, or tap for fast single shots. Supports flash, focus and zoom. Shutter sound can be turned of. DISCLAIMER : due to the high speed, pictures are not taken in the highest resolution possible, AND without color. This app uses your device hardware to the extreme - some devices are faster than others. 10 photos per seconds are measured on a Nexus One 2.2
release_text: MAJOR improvement in burst size - now up to 100 pictures in a burst! You can test this by selecting "All Available" in the Memory Buffer Size preference. Please email support@spritefish.com if you experience issues with this.

Ever dreamed of having your own restaurant? Start today with Diner City! This 3D diner tests your ability to run a successful business by cooking up delicious meals and serving them to cute customers! Need Help? Hire your own staff! You have a selection of different characters, each with their own strengths to help your diner succeed! The realism steps up with demanding customers! Don't make them wait too long, or they'll leave your diner and may not give you that second chance! If you run your restaurant well, there will be VIP customers that shows up to give you that extra reward that your diner deserves! It's your diner.. so put your personal touches on it! As your cafe business improves, grow the business literally by expanding the space and designing it any way you want! We have a large selection of interior design items to make your diner represent you. Game Play: - Hire and train staff to help with your ever expanding diner.- Design your diner with many of our unique decorations. - Each VIP has different abilities and bonuses that help you along the way. - Unlock more dishes as you level up! - It's a 3D game! You can play around with the camera angles and get a desired view to run your diner. - Watch out for special events! They can be found all over the map. Some are even hidden behind walls, so you will need to rotate your camera to find them. They are fun and rewarding! - Visit your neighbors' diner! See who has the best looking diner in town! Collect tips from your friends! ** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience.You may control in-app purchases made within this app using password protection which can be enabled from the setting page of the Google Play Store app. **
release_text: - You can now "Like" your neighbor's restaurant! - Add decoration so that people will "Like" your restaurant and earn free Diner Points! - Bug Fixes

description: *** New word puzzle game in several languages with ranking & online competition *** Fun with Blanks! New & Addictive word filling game with several packs based on different topics!!! Word Fill is a addictive word puzzle game and casual game supporting all popular mobile devices. --------------------------- *** Game Facts *** - Word filling game with scores, ranking and online competition. - Each pack is based on a particular topic with nine levels. - Normal, Medium, Hard & Expert difficulty modes. - Challenge your skills in 4 difficulty modes in several packs. - Compete with thousands of players around the world. - Tap over the words to find their meaning from online dictionary. - Languages : English, Spanish, French, German, Italian & Portuguese. --------------------------- *** Game Play *** - Tap over blanks in the board and fill the missing letters to form words shown above it. - Find all the words in the list to complete the level. - Faster you find words higher the score & ranking. --------------------------- *** Other Features *** - Awesome graphics with fluid animations. - Choose your board size to match your skill. - All packs have individual player ranking system based on the highest Score achieved. - Your rank naturally improves along with your skill as you play again and again, thats what makes WordFill so addictive.
release_text: - Google play leader boards and achievements added. - Sharing and other social features added. - Few other improvements & bug fixes are done.

description: LoonaPix Photo Effects is a free photo editor that is worth a try. It's surprisingly simple to try it out. Actions required: Step 1. Choose photo effect Step 2. Choose photo Step 3. Save or Share the result * * * * * * * * * That's all! All magic is made by LoonaPix and you get funny photo in seconds. There are billboards, graffity, magazines, sketchs and many other templates in our photo editor where your photo will look cool and funny, definetely. * * * * * * * * * IMPORTANT! New photo effects will automatically appear on your smartphone every week. * * * * * * * * * You can also easy share your creations with friends via favorite widgets. Please, notice WiFi or 3G Internet connections is required for LoonaPix app to work. If you have any problem with the app, please, let us know via android-effects@loonapix.com . But If you definitely like our application, you can Rate it. Your comment is also highly appreciated. * * * * * * * * * Tags: photo effects, photo editor, funny photo, photo editing, free, apps, online, photo frames

description: BringGo includes 30 days of access to Premium Navigation. After 30 days, you can still enjoy many map viewing and search functions on the mobile app, or opt for a Premium Navigation in-app purchase. ______________ CUSTOMER SUPPORT We're here to help! If you have any issue with BringGo, please send an inquiry to our friendly support team. http://bringgo.com/customer/feedback.php ______________ BringGo Mexico is a premium turn-by-turn navigation app for your smartphone. It is full of useful navigation features such as Text-To-Speech voice guidance, Lane Guidance, millions of onboard POIs and much more. Maps are stored on the smartphone for offline use. ______________ COMPATIBLE DEVICES The BringGo app has not been tested with all Android devices. In order to use BringGo with your infotainment unit, please check the compatibility list before making a purchase. The list of compatible devices is available on www.bringgo.com ______________ COMPATIBLE VEHICLES See www.bringgo.com for a complete list of compatible vehicles. ______________ PREMIUM NAVIGATION FEATURES • Turn-by-turn voice directions • Find Places: millions of onboard POIs plus Internet Search • Lane Guidance to show you the correct lane to be in • Map data from HERE (formerly known as NAVTEQ) onboard • Text-To-Speech voice guidance (speaks street names) • Auto re-routing • Multiple routing options; faster time, shorter distance, ECO route • Search by Address, Point on Map, postal code and more • POI Search • Save and edit favorites locations • Recent destinations list • Auto zooming map • Fuel cost calculator • Route summary for trip information • Current Location information Without an in-app purchase, BringGo still offers many benefits: • Current Location information • Find Addresses • Find Places: millions of onboard POIs plus Internet Search • Zoom and pan maps ______________ MAP COVERAGE Mexico ______________ IN-APP PURCHASES 1. Premium Navigation (USD 39.99)* Lifetime use of the navigation app and access to software updates. Please note that map updates are not available with this in-app purchase option. 2. Premium Navigation with Map Updates (USD 49.99)* Lifetime use of the navigation app and access to software updates. Annual map updates are available in years 2 and * Please refer to the IN APP PURCHASES section to view prices in local currency. ______________ GPS USAGE Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. ______________ * If you cannot hear the navigation guidance prompts from BringGo, or the volume of the navigation guidance prompts is too low, please see ‘Troubleshooting’ on www.bringgo.com
release_text: 1. Required Space and Available Space displayed during download. 2. Volume: easier to change navigation volume by using volume control buttons on the side of the phone. 3. Improvements to download and installation including error handling with suggestions. 4. Navigation turn-by-turn and signpost images improved.

description: If you have ever dreamed of looking like a beautiful super star or a princess, than this will be the perfect app to start experimenting all the different products needed to become just like them. In this game you can land a hand to our gorgeous princess to get ready for her first public appearing. You can make her start with some relaxing spa treatments to make sure that her skin is clean and as smooth as the one of a baby. Wash her hair and make it shine with some cool glitter effects. As second step help her choose the best matching mascara, hair color and style. Moreover if you should think that she would look nicer with a different eye color, you will be able to apply her some colored contact lenses. Next assist her in choosing the perfect make up and apply her a bit of eye shadow, lipstick, blusher etc. To complete your work it remains only to choose the right clothing and accessories for her big day. Now thanks to your help the princess is ready to face her first photo shooting and all the paparazzi’s that she might encounters on her way. After the makeover, you can save and share the pictures per mail, with Whatsapp, Twitter, Skype, or simply upload them to Facebook, Flickr, Dropbox etc. How to play: To get read of the pimples you need to rub on them until they disappear. To apply a mask simply select the type of mask you want to use and then spread the product on her face with the finger. To clean it either use the water shower or switch to the next beauty product. Some of the make-up products will automatically be applied on the model by simply selecting the desired icon (color), other will need to be applied with your finger. ** Features ** - Spa Section - Makeup Section - Fashion dress up Section - 360° View to have a better look at the model - Different hair styles to choose - Try different hair dye, lipstick colors, eye color, eye-shadow. - Accessories, including earrings, necklaces, crowns and a hat. - Share your awesome girl pictures easily on facebook, mail etc. with few clicks. The princess is a big fan of the Babsy baby! This is a great princess game / kids game and one of the best children games!

On iPhone/IPad platform, we have recorded over 1 million download, this can't be wrong. Love Cantonese This educational game may be the best toddler interactive game in the market of its kind which inspires a young child’s mind. We used appreciation education to encourage children to learn through play. for incorrect answers, we will encourage; for correct answers we reward their success to increase a child’s confidence. We believe there is no better and more effective way to learn other than through play. If you need to give a gift to you child, what would be better than one which is capable of acknowledging their achievements, while at the same time, providing inspiring and educational entertainment. With more than 13 different types of themes to select and expand, the game is in cantonese accompanied by high quality pictures and audio. Teacher's language can choose from English, Chinese, Cantonese or Japanese. The game can be operated using Traditional chinese, Simplified Chinese, Pinyin, Zhuyin (bopomofo), Jyutping, Japanese or english display. Text display variation: e.g. English is chosen to be used as primary text language for the game. By pressing the question hint at the bottom, it will translated into Chinese or Pinyin according to your settings. this version includes :- - 13 types of themes including Numbers, Colors, Fruit & Vegetables, Transportation, Animals, Daily Necessities, Occupation, Insects & Birds, Basic Words and Body Parts. - 200 reward stickers. - 10 different types of backgrounds. (for games and rewards). Should you need any help? Please email us at cs@gobaby123.com . Please do not use review section for help, we cannot reply you from there.

░▒▓█►CHALLENGE YOURSELF Lose 5 Pounds Every Week with this ultimate weight loss guide. - Metabolism/Boosting Workouts - Eating For Weight Loss - Shedding Additional Weight Losing 5 lbs. means losing approximately 17,500 calories from diet and exercise over the course of time or a third of a lb. (0.15kg) per day. Although your first 5 lbs. (2.3kg) in a large weight loss goal can be lost fairly quickly, the last 5 lbs. can take longer to shed. If you want to lose 5 lbs. in 1 week, you can do it by working out more efficiently and reducing your caloric intake until you hit your goal. ░▒▓█► Weight loss? ════════════════════════ Weight loss, in the context of medicine, health, or physical fitness refers to a reduction of the total body mass, due to a mean loss of fluid, body fat or adipose tissue and/or lean mass, namely bone mineral deposits, muscle, tendon, and other connective tissue. Weight loss can either occur unintentionally due to an underlying disease or arise from a conscious effort to improve an actual or perceived overweight or obese state. "Unexplained" weight loss that is not caused by reduction in calorific intake or exercise is called cachexia and may be a symptom of a serious medical condition. Intentional weight loss is commonly referred to as slimming (wikipedia.org). ════════════════════════ L5PEW is created to help you achieve your goal.

Write My Name Live wallpaper writes text on your home screen. Now you can write your home screen with your own name and message. Write your name, your lovers name or any funny or cool message on your home screen. 1. You can choose from stunning HD backgrounds for writing the text. 2. You can choose the font or style of text. 3. You can write multiple lines. 4. You can enable/disable fade animation. 5. Very low battery and memory consumption 6. No battery consumption when in standby. How to use 1. After installation, you will see a icon for the live wallpaper. Click on it and it will take you to the live wallpaper screen for choosing
Give style to your phone. Make it shine with this collection of wallpapers with theme of money, diamonds and gold. Stick out of the crowd!

Bring the power of Bunbury Realtors to your android device. Quickly find homes thoughout Wisconsin. Filter by distance and price range. Results include distance from your search location, price, beds and baths. Review a property detail sheet and visit the same property on www.bunburyrealtors.com to view additional media.
release_text: - Changed layout on property detail screen - Bug fixes

description: Listing of official and unofficial TCP and UDP port numbers in use for quick reference purposes. Similar to other apps, but this interface is more modern (with ActionBar) and the facility to search either by port number or a text search of the description field.
release_text: Added new port 52311 and keyboard pops up immediately when doing a search

description: Мой Нумизмат - каталог монет всего мира. В каталоге более 22 000 монет, которые были выпущены в более чем 700 странах (городах) по всему миру на протяжении более 2000 лет. Примерно 2.5 - 3 ГБ изображений монет, которые можно загрузить по мере необходимости. Вы можете поделиться изображениями монет с друзьями. Важно ! Необходима карта памяти встроенная или внешняя ( sdcard , extsd или т.п.). В основную память устройства данные загружаться не будут! После установки, приложение будет скачивать изображения монет по мере необходимости пакетами по 15-25 МБ. Предыдущий вариант приложения потерпел крах из-за утери файла цифровых подписей пакетов (сбой,повреждение жесткого диска).В результате : ни обновление ,ни любое другое изменение не возможно! My Numismatist - catalog of coins around the world. In the catalog of more than 22,000 coins, which were released in more than 700 countries (cities) around the world for over 2000 years. Approximately 2.5 - 3 GB of images of coins that can be loaded as needed. You can share the images of coins with friends. Important! description: Sokoban is a free version of classic computer puzzle game. Your goal is to push boxes to storage locations. Features: - contains 1000 Sokoban levels, all accessible for free (no need to pay any money) which equals to hundreds hours of fun - different difficulties from lite to very hard - contains solutions to most puzzles to help you with hard ones - intuitive swipe controls (possibility to use keyboard keys to push box) - simple and clean interface free of unnecessary distractions - all levels accessible from the beginning - undo system to withdraw wrong moves, useful for sokoban newbies - support for HD screens - all levels are proved to be solvable If you have any suggestion for improvements in Sokoban game then contact me directly: perunlabs@gmail.com

Let's face it. We all have a limited amount of time on this planet. A bucket list is a checklist of all the things you want to do before you die, or "Kick the bucket". Its an in-your-face method of motivating you to organize and carry out your life goals. Bucket List Buddy turns your mobile device into the ultimate bucket list. Using a simple, touch interface, create and update goals you want to achieve in your lifetime. Do you need an extra kick in the pants? Or perhaps you just want to reflect on how far you've come. Choose and attach photos to your entries, and then view them as slides in the Gallery mode. Its easy, fast, and convenient. No more hassling with pen and paper, or hunting down your list in that messy room of yours. You can always rely on your Bucket List Buddy! This is the ad supported version, Bucket List Buddy Free. We also have an ad free version available on the store, Bucket List Buddy. ** COMING SOON! ** + Import / Export to Dropbox. + Optimizations for tablets and larger displays.

description: Découvrez l’application mobile « Prépayé » qui vous permet de gérer votre carte prépayée partout et à tout moment depuis un smartphone. Avec cette application, La Banque Postale vous propose gratuitement une solution simple et sécurisée qui vous permet de gérer votre carte prépayée depuis votre smartphone. Vous pouvez ainsi consulter le solde de votre carte et les dernières opérations réalisées, activer, recharger et paramétrer votre carte depuis un smartphone à tout moment où que vous soyez. Pourquoi utiliser l’application Prépayé ? - Pratique : gérer sa carte prépayée partout et à tout moment. - Simple : le mode de fonctionnement de l’application mobile est le même que celui de l’espace personnel (web) auquel vous êtes habitués. - Rassurant : en cas de besoin, vous pouvez contacter le Service Clients Cartes Prépayées ou mettre la carte en opposition d’un simple « clic to call ». - Sécurisé : pour accéder à l’espace personnel sur l’application mobile, vous devez utiliser l’identifiant et le mot de passe qui vous ont été envoyés par courrier lors de la souscription de votre carte prépayée. En cas d’oubli, vous pouvez en demander la réédition en appelant le Service Clients Cartes Prépayées au 09.69.36.70.20 (coût des communications selon le tarif des opérateurs de communication en vigueur). La réédition de votre identifiant et de votre mot de passe vous sera facturée au tarif en vigueur dans les Conditions et Tarifs des prestations financières de La Banque Postale applicables aux particuliers. Les codes d’accès aux services en ligne La Banque Postale ne vous permettent pas d’accéder à l’application Prépayé. Discover mobile "Prepaid" which allows you to manage your prepaid card anywhere, anytime from a smartphone.   With this application, La Banque Postale offers a free simple and secure solution that allows you to manage your prepaid card from your smartphone. You can check the balance of your card and recent operations, enable, and set your recharge card from a smartphone at any time wherever you are. Why Use Prepaid application?  - Practical: manage its prepaid card anywhere at any time.  - Simple: the operating mode of the mobile application is the same as that of personal space (web) to which you are accustomed.  - Reassuring: in case of need, you can contact Customer Service Prepaid Cards or opposition to the map of a "click to call".  - Secure: to access the personal space on the mobile application, you must use the username and password that were sent to you by mail when you purchase your prepaid card. If you forget, you can request a reissue by calling Customer Service at 09.69.36.70.20 Prepaid Cards (communication costs according to the tariff of existing communication operators). The reissue of your username and password will be charged at the current rate in the Terms and rates applicable financial benefit The Banque Postale individuals. The access codes to online services La Banque Postale does not allow you to access the Prepaid application.

description: Welcome Atom's home, sir! You can get the extended icon set of the Black Mechanic theme! [ Download Mechanism Atom Iconpack ] http://goo.gl/XmuSrM ▶Atom Theme User Guide 1. Press and hold an empty space on the home screen to choose your theme, or press the menu for theme settings 2. Choose and apply the desired theme 3. Changing icons: able to change every icon (press and hold each icon to change individually). 4. Changing point color: able to change point colors on the top of home and app screens ▶Tips 1. Incorporating photos in the gallery with Atom icons (Menu – Wallpapers - Apply) 2. Changing colors and/or hiding home screen texts to match the theme (Launcher Settings – Home Screen – Icon Text Color) ▶Atom Store With weekly updated themes, icon packages, and widgets that range from sophisticated, simple themes to artists’ sensuous illustrations, you can decorate your phone’s home screen daily: search Atom Store on the search tab!! ▶Theme Maker A simple theme creating function that allows you to build your very own themes with the photos in your gallery 1. Press menu on your home screen, or enter through Theme Maker on the upper-right-hand corner of Theme Settings 2. Choose any wallpaper (multi-wallpaper, still photo, etc.) 3. Choose icons and point color and… 4. your very own personal theme! - You may not edit the theme once it is finished, but you can delete it in Theme Settings and simply create another! ▶Notes - Available in Android 4.0.2 or higher - You need at least 20MB in main storage to save theme related resources - The installed application’s icon will not be visible on the menu to improve usability - Soon to be available for tablet devices ex.) Galaxy Tab (X-large screen) - Badges for missed call and unread messages are only available in standard application: functionality may differ from one manufacturer to another - Optimus View series only supports a select few themes due to resolution (4:3) issues - Certain manufacturers’ default widgets may not show in Atom Launcher as they are made to use only from their default home screens ▶Customer Service Please leave reviews (5 stars are like Red Bull to exhausted developers) If you find any suggestions or inconveniences in using the application, please contact us through email addresses posted below: - Customer Service mail: cs@dlto.co.kr - Blog: http://blog.naver.com/atomlauncher - Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Atom.Home

This is a full-featured calendar for Android mobiles and tablets, ready for 2014 - 2022. With this product you can manage the same events as with the standard Android calendar, but in addition you will get a great overview over the current month. The calendar is very fast, and includes great features like overview/detail mode, searching for events and jumping to specific dates. Of course this application does not contain any advertisements. Moon Phases is included for 2011-2022. Calendar Pro/en supports built-in holidays between 2011 and 2022 for Sweden, Germany, Denmark and Finland. Flag days and name-days are also included for many of these countries (see below). Note that the week's first day and number adapt to the device region. The calendar is tested and designed for phones & tablets running Android from version 2.1 up to the latest version of Android 5, using several different brands of devices. Furthermore, it is tested with Google- and Exchange accounts. Functions: ✓ Events can be created/edited/deleted on the same accounts as the standard Android calendar, e.g. a Google calendar account ✓ Event colors (requires Google accounts and Android >= 4.0.3) ✓ Two reminders per event ✓ A lot of repetition alternatives, e.g. repeat weekly on specific weekdays ✓ Symbols showing repetition/alarm ✓ Copy/Paste events ✓ Three event text sizes ✓ Built-in holidays, names-days and flag-days for Sweden, Germany, Denmark and Finland ✓ Moon phases 2011-2022 ✓ Clear Inspection view of the full event with hyperlinks when appropriate ✓ Built-in summertime/wintertime day notes ✓ Context menus to add/delete/edit event ✓ Extensive user settings ✓ Two widgets: The small one showing three next upcoming events, the big showing more events, holiday info etc. ✓ Switch rapidly between different months/days by pressing icon buttons or by swiping your finger left/right over the display ✓ The home icon button takes you directly to todays date ✓ Calendar event colors can be selected per calendar account ✓ You can select which calendar accounts you want to show/sync/colorize ✓ Week numbers are built-in. Support both for EU and US week number systems ✓ Menu functions to jump to selected date or week number. ✓ Powerful search function ✓ You can double-click to toggle between overview/details of the month ✓ Reminder supported with alerts using the standard calendar function ✓ Both portrait and landscape mode are supported In English mode the product will have an international icon. In Android Market only one icon and one version of screen shots can be displayed The space in the application description is limited. Please read at the web site for a more complete description of this application.

THE FIVE LOVE LANGUAGES by Gary Chapman (unabridged) is presented by Oasis Audio. This standalone audiobook app combines a professional audio recording with supplemental features for download-once, grab-and-go anywhere enjoyment. The secret to love that lasts! “How do we meet each other’s deep emotional need to feel loved? If we can learn that and choose to do it, then the love we share will be exciting beyond anything we ever felt when we were infatuated.” (Dr. Gary Chapman.) Dr. Gary Chapman’s international bestseller has brought back or intensified the love in millions of marriages by revealing the five distinct languages we all use to express love: Words of Affirmation, Quality Time, Gifts, Acts of Service, and Physical Touch. Couples who understand each other’s love language hold a priceless advantage in the quest for love that lasts a lifetime— they know how to effectively and consistently make each other feel truly and deeply loved. That gift never fades away. Includes the personal profile for Husbands & Wives. This was professionally recorded by the author and Oasis Audio. DURATION: About 4.75 hours of narration. "Forgiveness is not a feeling; it is a commitment." (Gary Chapman)

Enjoy the unity of hunting and nature in combination with the most modern communications technology. *** PLEASE NOTE: TO BE ABLE TO FULLY BENEFIT FROM THIS APP A WUH REVIERWELT ACCOUNT IS REQUIRED! YOU CAN CREATE AN ACCOUNT UNDER WWW.WUH-REVIERWELT.DE *** For more transparency and flexibility in the everyday routines of the hunting area we have developed an online administration system after many years of practical experience, to make your hunting easier. Our aim is to make available a program for management of hunting area with minimal upkeep and maintenance effort. Uncomplicated management rules ensure high benefits regarding documentation, transparency and key figures in the hunting area. The app offers the following features of the WuH-Revierwelt: Hunting area map: Area map with hunting area boundary and additional information such as station facilities, points of interest (POI), kills of all hunting area members, tasks in the area, alarm signals from trap- and alarm-devices and and diary entries. GPS-tracking: With the GPS-tracking you can locate your dogs whereever they are. You can connect the GPS-tracking with a variety of commercially available trackers like MU201, TK102 or TK5000. Also your Android-Phone can be a GPS-tracker to record your location and share it with other hunting area members. *** PLEASE NOTE: If the app is recording routes when the app is in the background, the battery of the device can be discharged faster than normal. *** Hunting area book: Every member of your hunting area can post a message to your hunting area book. This message is shared with each member of the hunting area by sms, mail or push notification. All entries are available in the hunting area book. If you shoot an animal, it will automatically be transfered in your shooting list. Every entry will be synchronized with all other hunting area members. Alarm-/trapmonitoring: Messages that were logged by alarm devices and game cameras are displayed. Manual alarm messages can be entered. Record your hits and todos: Take photos and input all information for a hunting stand or a poi with the exact location of the object. The Object is then displaying on the map and shared with other members of the hunting area. Mooncalendar: A hunting extensive lunar calendar with moon brightness scale. SOS-Mode: Integrated SOS mode. The device triggers an alarm depending on the situation at all your hunting colleagues. It transmitts the sender and the exact position of the device. (e.g. during fall of the hunting stand ladder or similar dangerous situations, where you cannot summon any help, the device is reliable - that can save lives!) Compass: Navigate to the last registered/reported position. Navigate to all hunting stands, hotspots or points of interest covered in the hunting area. Hotspots: With "hotspots" you can mark your gps-location and share it with other members of your hunting area. For example, you can mark your vehicle, wound beds, the piece found etc. Other members of your hunting area can navigate to this location with the compass of the app. Revierwelt offers many more features. Register under www.revierwelt.de and try out the app!
release_text: - Sprache kann in den Einstellungen geändert werden - Pfeile auf aufgezeichneten Routen darstellen - Route per SMS oder Mail an jemanden senden können - Gastzugang schon mit aktiviertem Tracker versenden können - "jetzt neue Route beginnen" in Optionsmenü hinzugefügt - Neue Funktion: Kirrüberwachung Gerätekonfiguration - Neue Funktion: Route abspielen lassen mit Player und Scrollbar - Neue Funktion: Kirrüberwachung-Alarmregeln - Neue Funktion: GPS-Alarmregeln - weitere Fixes & Verbesserungen

description: Z-DeviceTest lets you check your Android device sensors "health" in an intuitive and comprehensive way offering in-depth analysis all the characteristics of your Smartphone. You can use the application to: -To complement the manufacturer's technical information. -To compare the technical differences between more than 600 models of devices on the market. -Test the proper functioning of all your sensors. -Measure the accuracy of each sensor. -To get the most out of your Smartphone. -To check the GPS signal, camera, compass, accelerometer, microphone, speakers, WiFi signals, Bluetooth, GSM / UMTS, FM Radio, Display, Battery, CPU, Memory, Vibration, USB, Audio / Video , operating system, light sensor, proximity sensor, temperature sensor, flash sensor, NFC near field comunication, Barometer, the detection of Navstar satellites in the constellation jointly and individually, .. etc.. Please do not hesitate to send your comments to: E-mail: z-devicetest@zausan.com Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/topic.php?uid=145081415519605&topic=200 Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/user/zausaninnova?feature=mhee Version 1.13 New infrared sensor added. New virtual sensor step detector added. New virtual sensor step counter added. Camera detection bugs (force close) solved. Log report bug corrected. Version 1.11 Updated camera api to level 15 (Android ICS 4.0.4). Version 1.9 Several bugs corrected. Version 1.8 Hygrometer sensor added (relative humidity. 4 new "Virtual" sensors added: -Gravity (Gravity acceleration measure) -Gyroscope (device angular speed measure) -Angular Acceleration (Device Orientation relative to a tangent to earth plane coordinate system) -Lineal acceleration (3 axis acceleration measure without gravity effect). Added a 2D graphic representation of several sensors. 3D graphis added to several sensors. Numerical calc. for highest sensors rate. Several bugs corrected. Version 1.6.19 - Added support for NFC. Version 1.6.16 - Added support for Ant+ devices. Version 1.6.13 -Added in a test GPS accuracy to meet itself. Version 1.6.12 The block-GPS can check what Navstar satellite constellation are giving you coverage at all times and know the detailed specifications of each. Version 1.6.11 Corrected minor bugs. Version 1.6.10 - Added test pressure sensor of the touch screen. - Detection of multimedia chip. - Detection of version ALSA (Advanced Linux Sound Architecture). - Detection of process model. - Detection of the number of processors. - Detection of the processor frequency. - Added OpenGL version detection. - Added detection of OpenGL graphics chip. - The flash works on some models.

description: Taplingua es una aplicación única en el mercado, totalmente distinta a cualquier otra que hayas usado antes. Somos diferentes porque te ofrecemos: Un método personalizado: Aprendes mediante explicaciones en vídeo en los que una tutora te explica de forma sencilla cómo funciona la lengua inglesa. Uno de nuestros usuarios dice que “con Taplingua es como tener una profesora en tu bolsillo”. Una forma más rápida y eficaz de aprender inglés ya que nuestras explicaciones breves y simples de la lengua inglesa están en tu lengua materna (español o portugués). De esta forma entiendes bien lo que aprendes y puedes avanzar más rápidamente. Aprender expresiones útiles a través de situaciones prácticas como, por ejemplo, pedir un café, preguntar cómo llegar a un lugar, etcétera. Aprende inglés real, expresiones y palabras que usa la gente en la calle y que tú también podrás utilizar desde el primer día. Estudia a tu propio ritmo. Con Taplingua puedes aprender cuándo quieras y dónde quieras ya que todo lo que necesitas es tu móvil o tableta (Android y Iphone). Con nosotros tendrás la flexibilidad que una escuela o academia de inglés no te dan. Aprovecha el tiempo que pasas en el transporte público o los “ratos muertos” para aprender o mejorar tu inglés y progresar en tu trabajo. Nuestras lecciones son cortas, así que podrás completarlas cuando dispongas de unos minutos. Taplingua es una forma entretenida de aprender inglés ya que practicarás lo que aprendiste a través de juegos divertidos e interactivos. Es económico. Nuestros precios son muy competitivos ¡Ya no necesitas gastar una fortuna para aprender inglés! Quienes somos: Taplingua ha sido creada por la Dra. Cristina Guijarro. Cristina tiene más de 15 años de experiencia en la enseñanza de idiomas para adultos en Estados Unidos y España. Cristina cuenta con la ayuda de un equipo de desarrolladores y expertos en el aprendizaje de idiomas que está constantemente actualizando y mejorando la aplicación para que tú aprendas inglés de una forma sencilla, rápida y efectiva. No pierdas el tiempo jugando a Candy Crash o Flappy Bird cuando puedes jugar con Taplingua que te ayudará a mejorar tus perspectivas laborales. En la actualidad, Taplingua funciona mejor en Samsung Galaxy 5 pero también funciona en otros dispositivos Android. Estamos desarrollando la versión para iPhone 6 y esperamos que esté disponible muy pronto. + Características: - Curso completo A2/B1 - Curso interactivo con vídeos muy breves en los que una profesora te explica gramática y vocabulario en español - Situaciones muy prácticas inicialmente y temas más complicados en niveles avanzados - Juegos para practicar los temas aprendidos - Más que 75 niveles y 50 vídeos: añadiendo nuevos niveles cada semana - Variedad de juegos con aumento de nivel de dificultad Taplingua is a unique completely different application on the market, any other you've used before. We are different because we offer: A custom method: You learn by video explanations in which a tutor explains you easily how the English language works. One of our users said that "Taplingua is like having a teacher in your pocket." A faster and effective way to learn English as our brief and simple explanations of the English language are in your native language (Spanish or Portuguese). This way you understand well what you learn and you can move faster. Learn useful expressions through practical situations, eg, order a coffee, ask directions to a place, and so on. Learn Real English, expressions and words that people use on the street and you also can use from day one. Study at your own pace. With Taplingua you can learn whenever you want and wherever you want because everything you need is your mobile or tablet (Android and iPhone). With us you will have the flexibility that school English not get. Take the time you spend on public transport or "dead times" to learn or improve your English and make progress in your work. Our lessons are short, so you can complete them when you have available a few minutes. Taplingua is an entertaining way to learn English because you practice what you learn through fun and interactive games. It is economical. Our prices are very competitive no longer need to spend a fortune to learn English! Who we are: Taplingua created by Dr. Cristina Guijarro. Cristina has over 15 years experience in teaching languages ​​to adults in the United States and Spain. Cristina has the help of a team of developers and experts in language learning that is constantly updating and improving the app for you to learn English in a simple, fast and effective way. Do not waste your time playing or Flappy Bird Candy Crash when you can play with Taplingua that will help you improve your job prospects. Currently, Taplingua works best on Samsung Galaxy 5 but also works on other Android devices. We are developing the iPhone version 6 and expect it to be available soon. + Features: - Complete course A2 / B1 - Interactive course with very short videos in which a teacher will explain grammar and vocabulary in Spanish - Situations initially very practical and more complicated subjects at advanced levels - Games to practice the learned topics - More than 75 levels and 50 videos: adding new levels each week - Variety of games with increasing difficulty level

description: Deze handige én geheel gratis applicatie maakt het mogelijk om de beste adressen te kiezen uit de 987 campings die zijn aangesloten bij Camping Qualité. Onderweg in Frankrijk is de Camping Qualité-gids in alle vrijheid toegankelijk, ook zonder internetverbinding, want na het downloaden van de applicatie is deze ook beschikbaar zonder verbinding. U kunt campings zoeken die het dichtst bij u in de buurt zijn, evenals de te bezoeken plaatsen, of een camping zoeken via de zoekmachine, de beschikbaarheid van plaatsen en zelfs foto's bekijken om u te helpen bij het bepalen van uw keuze… U kunt ook contact opnemen met een camping door eenvoudigweg te klikken op het telefoonnummer of het e-mailadres. Daarnaast kunt u met deze applicatie een routebeschrijving krijgen naar de door u gekozen camping of plaats. Het is met deze applicatie ook mogelijk om de campings van uw voorkeur op te slaan bij uw 'favorieten' of in het adresboek van uw telefoon, zodat ze gemakkelijker terug te vinden zijn. Nog heel veel andere functionaliteitenstaan u te wachten… De applicatie is gemaakt door Planet Bourgogne in opdracht van Camping Qualité. This convenient and totally free application allows the best addresses to choose from 987 campsites that are members of Quality Camping. Way in France is the Quality Camping Guide completely free access, even without an Internet connection, because after downloading the application is also available without a connection. You can search for campsites closest to your area, as well as places to go, or a camping site through the search engine, the availability of places and even photos to help you in determining your choice ... You can also contact a site by simply clicking on the phone number or email address. You can also use this application to get directions to your chosen campsite or place. It is also possible to use this application campsites your preferred store to your 'favorites' or in the address book of your phone, so they are easier to find. Many other features are waiting ... The application is made by Planet Burgundy commissioned by Quality Camping.

description: This is a art class for beginners to learn how to create fashion design illustrations using computer software and also templates. We will cover some offline sketching and also how to put your illustrations to a practical use. Anyone will benefit from the course whether you are a beginner and do not know how to draw or if you are a talented artist who would like to learn how to get your designs on the computer without spending alot on expensive software applications. *YOU ARE GOING TO GET FROM THIS COURSE* - Over 10 lectures and 1.5 hours of content! - This course will cover the basics of fashion illustration for a beginner you will learn basic design skills using templates very fun and easy - You will learn how to create unique Fashion Trend boards - You will learn how to use software to create fashion design illustrations - You will learn how to sketch for beginners a basic body shape template *WHAT YOU WILL LEARN* ✔ Fashion Design Sketching ✔ How To Use Design Templates Lesson 2 Part1 ✔ How To Use Design Templates - Part 2 ✔ Fashion Trend Boards ✔ Drawing The Face ✔ Practical Uses For Design Illustrations ✔ Art Illustrations Accessories And Portfolios ✔ Fashion Design Illustration For Beginners - Class Resource List ✔ Create A Final Course Project ✔ Submit Your Final Project *FEATURES* • Lifetime access to 10 lectures and 1 quizzes • A community of 9700+ students learning together! • Watch courses on the go: video lectures, audio lectures, presentations, articles and anything inside your course. • Watch courses in offline: Save courses for offline viewing so you can watch them while you're on a plane or subway! "If you've never done any fashion illustration and are interested in learning the basics, then this is course for you. Kim has created a course that makes it simple to go from novice to intermediate illustrator in just a few short steps. I particularly liked how she filmed the course over her shoulder so that I could see how she was working. It made me feel like I was right there learning one on one. This was a great introduction and I look forward to more advanced lessons to come!" -(Jamie Louise)★★★★★ Instructed By : Kim Holmes | Personal Development Coach Kim has over 10 years of experience in internet marketing with major companies and she also love blogging and ebook publishing. Install the "Fashion Design Illustration" app now and join over 4 million students who are already learning on Udemy.

description: Calendar Droid is a calendar application that works with all the calendars on your device (such as Google Calendar, Exchange, Facebook, Birthdays, etc.) The philosophy behind this app is a calendar that is easy to use, clean, intuitive, and highly customizable. This is the paid version of Calendar Droid. There is a free version that will remain free and without ads. Please consider supporting the development by buying this. FEATURES ONLY IN PAID VERSION: • Advanced recurrence/repeating rules like bi-weekly (choose 'Weekly' to show more options), etc. • Copy/paste of events • Preview on color settings • (**Android 3+ only**) Agenda widget (**Android 3+ only**) • Select which calendars to show • Change default reminder time FEATURES: • Month View / Week View / Day View / Agenda View / Weeks View • View events • Add/edit events • Settings to customize (many options for customization) • Action Bar on all versions of Android FUTURE FEATURES IN PAID VERSION ONLY: **** THESE ARE NOT IN THE VERSION YET! • Localization (more languages) • Change calendar colors • Search events • Color themes • More widgets Remember: You have to synchronize the calendars to your device for them to show up. PERMISSIONS: • READ CONTACT DATA If you have any guests (or attendees) on an event and you have that person in your contacts the app will read information from that contact and show it when viewing an event. The contact picture will show up and then clicked will take you to the default "contact clicked" scenario. I know this permission looks bad together with internet access but I do not store nor send any contact info. Only contacts that are guests to viewed events are read by the program. • READ CALENDAR EVENTS This should be obvious. Read the description again and see if you can spot what this is used for ;) • ADD OR MODIFY CALENDAR EVENTS AND SEND EMAIL TO GUESTS Again, this should be obvious. Calendar Droid needs to change your calendar events. Sending emails to guests is done when putting email addresses in the "guest" box when creating an event. • WAKE LOCK Used by the widget. This actually saves battery since the widget does not wake up the phone when it has the screen off. The wake lock is only used to keep the phone alive during updates. The update interval is controller by "alarms". • READ SYNC SETTINGS Use to read which calendars that are synchronized to the device. • GET ACCOUNTS Used to find accounts with calendars so they can be selected to be synchronized. • MANAGE ACCOUNTS Used to manage the synchronize settings for calendars under a account.
release_text: 1.6.6 - Bug fix release • Fix: The widget is now updating events and header • Fix: Rare start-up crash • Fix: Agenda view updating when new events are created • Fix: Events being on the wrong times when deleting a really early event • Fix: The add button will now select a more appropiate time if no time is selected manually

description: Bright LED flashlight is an Android app, which uses the LED on your device to emit light in dark areas and illuminates your surroundings. No more darkness with this app. It now supports strobe effect, meaning if flashes rapidly for getting someone's attention, for example. You can also set the background to a wite on, so it would light up more area. *This is an ad-supported application. The ads are located on the bottom of the screen.

The Human Anatomy application is a very simple quick reference guide to Human Anatomy. The Features that are offered in this application include: ● TTS - Text To speech conversion for all those who hate reading. ● Share - A way to Share the Content that you just found helpful. ● Easy Navigation from Home Screen and to the Spotting Screens. ● Wiki Link for Extra information on the topic you are reading. ● Pinch to zoom to have a more clear picture. It gives brief information on the following topics ● Cardio Vascular System ● Digestive system ● Endocrine - Central Nervous ● Endocrine - Reproductive ● Endocrine - Alimentary ● The Eye ● Female Reproductive System ● Lymphatic System ● Male Reproductive System ● Muscular System - Back ● Muscular System - Front ● Nervous System ● Respiratory System ● Skeletal System - Back ● Skeletal System - Front ● Urinary System Go ahead and Enjoy these bits. If you encounter any kind of bugs, feel free to report them at blackdroidinc@gmail.com

HIGHLIGHTS ------------------------------- + the first truly interactive activity book app for children! + featured in this app: over 80 great and vivid possibilities to interact + lovingly hand-drawn illustrations + all animations are supplemented with whimsical sounds + navigation bar locking option. + easy operation with finger swipe + automatic detection of different children's fingers and hands + chapter index for quick favorite scene selection + particularly suitable for children aged 18 months to 6 years + Fully supported languages: - Arabic - Chinese - Dutch - English - French - German - Italian - Japanese - Korean - Norwegian - Brazilian Portuguese - Russian - Spanish - Swedish - Turkish DESCRIPTION ------------------------------- Three lovingly hand-drawn and colored scenes show our circus with its animals, artists and audience. Learn about life at the circus with its crazy stories and affectionate residents. There’s so much to be discovered! Little explorers can search for and activate the many amusing animations just by touching the screen, and they’ll have tons of fun watching the action over and over again. Sophisticated sounds and a delightful piano soundtrack in the background top off the experience. The children’s book "Toddler's Seek & Find: My Animal Circus" The very first "picture book" app in the iTunes Store. Three scenes show funny animals, artists and clowns at the circus. A must for any picture book fan! Since the founders have children themselves within the target age group, the new app benefits from extensive insight gained through numerous tests in their own 'in-house labs' in the course of development. We’d be happy to hear any feedback or suggestions you might have. Give us a call or email us. SUPPORT REFERENCE ------------------------------- Should you face any problems nonetheless, we would appreciate your understanding that we cannot provide any support on review comments. Instead, please read the FAQs on our website (www.wonderkind.de) and/or email us, so that we can immediately react and help. Thank you.

description: Ice Floe is a free brain and puzzle game packed with hundreds of levels for hours of fun. You will quickly be addicted ! The goal of the game is to help your penguin get in the ice floe hole. This can be achieved by moving properly the fishermen, bears, whales and walrus found on the board. As you enter the challenge mode, you will be faced with incresinsgly difficult levels. Your children will also be very happy as we included an arcade version with easier to play levels. The game has nice HD graphics. You will also like the various animations such as the one where the penguin moves his feet accross the ice floe.

description: Welcome to iFishing : Saltwater Edition Lite, a new fishing game by Rocking Pocket Games. i Fishing Saltwater is a challenging saltwater spinoff from the original smash hit, i Fishing. This version includes 1 location from the full game. News: iFishing Saltwater 2 is now available with HD graphics! Features: - 10 tournaments with unlockable locations will keep you playing for a long time. Instead of lakes, explore large ocean areas. - Variety of lures with different actions (jigs, topwater, spoons, divers) - Many species of saltwater fish to catch (blue marlin, swordfish, bluefin tuna, sharks, greater amberjack, red snapper, goliath grouper, barracuda, false albacore, flaming angel, knobbed porgy, nassau grouper, mackerel, permit, pompano, roosterfish, and tarpon - Use the accelerometer to cast, jig, aim your lure, and fight fish. - Exciting fish fights while keeping the line tension in check, even see them jump! - Use the fish finder and drive your boat to seek out the best places to fish - Advanced fish AI, including schooling behavior, lure preferences, and hotspots based on structure such as dropoffs, weeds, reefs, and logs - Practice, Tournament modes - Day/night cycle and relaxing ocean ambient sounds - Trophy room to keep track of your biggest fish ever caught. - Fishing guide gives you audible advice and encouragement!
release_text: -Redesigned main menu -Added more games button -Added fast game restore on newer devices -Improved fish and rod graphics and animation -Improved splash animations -Bug Fixes

description: MOONSHINE – ICON PACK Our Moonshine – Icon Pack is based on Google’s (rumored and leaked) Android icon re-design project, Project Moonshine . All 16 authentic icons from the original leaked screen shot are included, painstakingly created in vector format and provided in XXXHDPI resolution for pixel-perfect detail. The idea behind our Moonshine – Icon Pack was simple … to re-create, as faithfully as possible, the collection of Project Moonshine icons that have leaked so far. The original Android Police article is a great source if you are not familiar with the leak, or for more detailed information: http://goo.gl/frvUNg Our Moonshine – Icon Pack is not a theme, and does not contain extraneous elements like wallpapers or unrelated icons. There are already many great flat and long-shadow icon packs here on Google Play, we did not want to add any designs that were not specifically linked to Project Moonshine in this particular icon pack. If any additional Project Moonshine icons surface, we plan to add them and update this pack. Also, we will be releasing additional icon packs and Android theme-related visual assets here on Google Play soon! As always, we continue to make much of our vector source artwork available free-of-charge for members of the Android developer community to use in their projects; download links and additional information can be found on Google+ at: http://plus.google.com/+BrianGoss FEATURES  •  Includes all 16 leaked Project Moonshine icons  •  Created in vector format for pixel-perfect icons  •  XXXHDPI Ultra High Density resolution     * XXXHDPI = 192 x 192 pixels Please Note: Our Moonshine – Icon Pack (like all icon packs) requires a third party launcher or Unicon. If you are new to all this, the FREE version of Nova Launcher is a good place to start: http://goo.gl/iCQpDM HOW TO APPLY  •  Choose a custom launcher from Google Play  •  We recommend Nova Launcher or Apex  •  In launcher, select Theme or Icon settings  •  Choose Moonshine Icon Pack –it’s that easy! CONTACT INFORMATION FOR DESIGN – http://plus.google.com/+BrianGoss – http://twitter.com/BrianEdwardGoss – @BrianEdwardGoss on Twitter SUPPORT INFORMATION For Technical Support, contact us at: info@plaidduckdesign.com or http://plaidduckdesign.com If you have any questions or requests, please feel free to let us know via email, social media, or at: http://plaidduckdesign.com Thank You!

Scan your credit or debit card's information with Triangle Scanner. You can read any RFID enabled card! You'd be surprised how much information can be extracted from your card just by tapping it to your phone. Triangle Scanner uses the free Triangle APIs to scan the cards. This NFC technology will help you at the checkout in your favorite apps since you no longer have to enter your card information manually. Just tap it to your phone and be done! We currently support: - Visa PayWave - MasterCard PayPass - American Express ExpressPay - Interac Flash Triangle Scanner does not transmit or store card information. The scanning is done entirely on your device and only the last 4 digits of your cards are captured, keeping you completely safe. Triangle API could be leveraged to improve the check out experience by removing the burden of manual card entry and replacing it with a simple tap. same gesture your users perform at a gas station. Triangle's API provides you all the information necessary to process a payment by a simple tap. Visit http://www.triangle.io for more information and contact us at contact@triangle.io to provide feedback.

Are you commuting on Houston public transport? Then TripMate Houston Lite is your ideal companion. TripMate Houston Lite is a powerful offline timetable app which provides fast timetable access for METRO Houston Buses & Light Rail. With TripMate in your pocket you have access to Houston's transit information anywhere and anytime. Unlike other transit applications you do not need network access to check your timetable information. This means you get results fast. TripMate makes your commute easy with a variety of benefits: * TripMate works anytime and anywhere. No data network connection required. * Immediately find the next departure for your Stop. By Route or by Stop name. * Use predictive search from the action bar on the top of the app to quickly find your Route or Stop. * View next Departures for any METRO transit Stop or Station in Houston. * View Trip details. * View the Stops for your Trip on the map. * All the timetable information is stored on your phone. * TripMate informs you when updated timetable information is available for download from the 'More' screen. Don't worry, TripMate has the smallest timetable files among all other transit apps out there. This saves you both bandwidth and storage space on your device. Check your notifications bar to download the most up-to-date timetable available. * Note: all times displayed are local Houston times This free version is ad supported. For an ad-free version and additional functionality (Favourites, Nearby Search, etc) please check out our paid version. Get access to fast timetable information and download TripMate Houston Lite today! For any feedback or bugs please contact us on Twitter (@trip_mate), our website ( http://www.tripmate.info/contact ) or like us on Facebook ( http://facebook.com/tripmateapp ).
